1.content: You unlock this door with the key of imagination. Beyond it is another universe beyond that which is known to man—a universe of sound, a universe of sight, a universe of mind. It is a universe as vast as space and as timeless as infinity. It is the middle ground between light and shadow, between science and superstition, and it lies between the pit of man's fears and the summit of his knowledge. You are about to travel a journey into a wondrous universe of both shadow and substance, of things and ideas, whose boundaries are that of imagination. That's the signpost up ahead— you've just crossed over into your next stop, it is an area which we call the Slobverse! Who shall find themselves here?
1.title: The start

111.content: What kind of comics did you have in mind?
111.title: Comic crossovers

1111.content: Okay, here's a few options.
1111.title: Marvel/DC

111111.content:
Jennifer Walters sat in her office and chuckled to herself as she used her phone to look up her own exploits as She-Hulk on social media. Her favorites thus far were the story of how she wiped out three all you-can- eat buffets in one day and the video of her taking on the challenge to break the world burping record. The jade super heroine's belch was so powerful that even watching the replay seemed to make her phone shake! Jen began another bout of laughter until she stopped and decided to look at an older video. This one showed her as She-Hulk battling with Titania outside a Mexican restaurant. In fact, it was a restaurant that Jen often frequented and had been visiting on the day of the incident.

An enormous grin spread across the heroic lawyer's face as she watched her mighty- muscled gamma self pound on Titania and knock her to the ground before positioning herself over the villain's face. There was a faint rumbling sound and..."PFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFT!" Jennifer laughed out loud now as she watched her on-screen counterpart unleash a monstrous toxic fart in her rival's face, the perfect end to a fight that followed a heavy, gas-inducing meal. She was feeling so good at the moment that she decided to transform and admire herself in her full-length office mirror.

"I may only be the second strongest next to Bruce," She-Hulk said as she flexed her huge muscles, "but I am most definitely the gassiest one there is!" Just then, her phone received an update and She-hulk was shocked to Wonder Woman was now trending above her because she had beaten Supergirl in a belching contest, her winning belch having caused the collapse of a nearby building.

Jennifer glared at her phone as her good mood rapidly soured. She and Wonder woman had long had an intense rivalry and while she would begrudgingly admit that the amazon surpassed her in strength{for now} and fame as both a heroine and sex symbol, she refused to allow anyone to beat her in terms of gas!

The jade giantess impulsively went back to the video of her belching and took note of the fact that while her mighty eruct ion shattered windows and caused a great tremor, no buildings collapsed as far as could tell. This made her so angry that she crushed the phone in her hand.
...
It was some hours later that Diana Prince, agent of the department of metahuman affairs, was called in to aid S.H.I.E.L.D. in stopping a rampaging She-hulk. She knew right away that Wonder Woman was needed and slipped away to change into costume at the first opportunity. Not wanting to risk innocents by engaging her rival in a fight, she chose to ensnare She-Hulk in her unbreakable Lasso of Truth and drag her away.

"Alright, Jennifer, talk! Why have you suddenly decided to emulate your cousin?" Wonder Woman demanded to know while they let She-Hulk's firm handle things with S.H.I.E.L.D. and the Department.

"I was jealous of you for upstaging me." She-Hulk blurted out, compelled by the Lasso's magic. "Oh?" Diana couldn't tell whether she was irritated or amused. "Is this about our last arm-wrestle? The weight-lifting contest? The flex-off, perhaps?"

Wonder Woman playfully flexed her mighty arm. It clearly surpassed She-Hulk and raised Jen's ire even further. "You...out-belched me. Nobody does that! I want a burping contest, here and now!"

Diana shook her head. "I knew I shouldn't have accepted Kara's challenge. Very well, but no more tantrums, agreed?" Jen nodded and Wonder Woman untied her. "You may start us off."

She-Hulk sucked in a big breath. "BUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU-UUU UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU UUUUUUUUUUUUUU-RRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR RRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR RRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRP!" The resulting belch echoed through the city and made Diana's hair flutter a bit.

"Very good, but not good enough! BEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE-EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE EEEEEEEEEELLLLLLLCHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!" Wonder Woman's massive belch blew She-hulk backwards and surpassed her's in volume, yet somehow caused less damage to the city and made people laugh, even the authorities!

"I want a rematch!" She-hulk demanded as she got to her feet, somewhat embarrassed by how whiny she sounded. Wonder Woman began to think. "Very well then, you'll have it. I invite you to compete in some Amazon trials with me on Themyscara a month from now. There will not only be a belching contest, but you'll have a chance to beat me at eating, farting, and several other things at well. What do you say?"

Jennifer waited for a long moment before clasping Diana's hand in a grip that would've crushed a normal' woman's bones. "You're on, Wondie! See you in a month."
111111.title: She-Hulk and the Slob Trials of Themyscara Part 1!

choices: She-Hulk is, but must first beat other amazons before confronting Diana.
She-Hulk is, and confronts Diana right away. Diana is slobbed out.
She-hulk is is, and confronts Diana right away. Diana is still slim.
1111111.content:
Jen wanted to know more about what she'd be getting into, so she contacted Supergirl, who idolized her and had lived on Themyscara for a time during her first days on Earth, to learn more about these amazon games. There were eating and gas competitions as Wonder Woman had said, but also various gross-out contests that involved body odor and other such things. It was supposed to be an ancient, annual series of events that defied the unrealistic expectations placed upon all females in "man's world", but it was really just an excuse to cut loose. Few outsiders had been invited to participate and even fewer had won. Supergirl had managed a very close victory against Cassie Sandsmark and Rogue had managed to win, but others like Lois Lane and Sue Richards had lost badly. Jen had also learned that the winner would spend a week on Themyscara, being worshiped by the loser and all amazons. This made the heroic lawyer's drive to win even greater and she spent her time gorging on New York pizza and other fast foods while ignoring things like showering and basic hygiene. She did this all as plain Jennifer Walters, becoming as obese and dirty as humanly possible without transforming once. Just as building muscle as Jennifer Walters had resulted in a buffer, stronger, She-Hulk that could take on the Champion of the Universe, it stood to reason that a slobbier Jennifer would result in a She Hulk who could out-eat and out-gas the strongest amazon. Jen went to bed each night of this routine dreaming of her victory and Diana kissing her big, smelly green feet.

A month later, the heroic Lawyer finally arrived on Themyscara via a private plane that Diana Prince had discreetly arranged for. The moment it touched down, the obese Jennifer allowed herself to transform for the first time in a while. The result? A She-Hulk whose enormous gut strained the limits of her badly stained special uniform treated with unstable molecules, whose reeking body was covered with irradiated sweat that had taken on a slime-like appearance and pooled underneath her pits. Flies and other insects were actually buzzing around her and she'd allowed some snot to dribble from her nose. All this and the still prominent gamma muscle that blended into her monstrous fat made Jen feel as though the amazons, particularly Diana, would be intimidated as well as disgusted by her. Instead, the women who met her plane cheered for her, each one sporting a sizable gut and letting out a belch or fart every few minutes along with it. Queen Hippolyta, Wonder woman's own mother, was nearly as big as her and smelled just as bad.

"Welcome, Jennifer. We are honored to have you with us. Knowing that a warrior such as you has seen fit to join our games will make these our most exciting trials yet. Are you ready to begin?"
1111111.title: She-Hulk and the Slob Trials of Themyscara Part 2!

choices: They are both transformed into slobs by the same super villain
111112.content: Here are some more choices.
111112.title: Other

choices: She-hulk takes Supergirl's display as a challenge and accepts.
She-hulk is annoyed and asks Supergirl to leave. Supergirl challenges her.
She-hulk is in impressed and asks Kara to hang. They have a friendly challenge.
11112.content:
She-hulk had just beaten her arch-rival, Titania, in full view of a small town diner near the city of Metropolis, working up a hulk-sized appetite in the process. The patrons were soon watching the famous heroine devour massive amounts of greasy double cheese burgers, chili digs, and sloppy joes. The whole thing was a gross mess that involved no manners at all and She-hulk reveled in it. It was always so much fun to deliberately defy the sexy image the public had of her.

By the end of it, Jen sported a massive green gut that stood out from the rest of her amazonian physique. Now for her favorite part! Leaning back a bit on the stool she sat on, the gamma heroine thumped her chest and unleashed a belch that shook the entire establishment, shattering every window. She chuckled quietly to herself as she imagined the shocked faces staring at her and the low grumbling from her immense gut made her grin widen.

"Sorry to everyone down wind." She-hulk quipped as she raised her powerful left leg and leaned to the side in order to unleash a massive toxic fart. The resulting smell put half the diner into a coma. The other half ran out the door while trying not to vomit.

Jen laughed out loud, but her joy was quickly interrupted by someone applauding her...from above.She looked up to see none other than Supergirl, a goofy grin plastered on her face. "That was...awesome!"

The girl of Steel had been working at her job as Daily Planet intern, Linda Lang, when her super hearing picked up the excited whispers about She-hulk's diner binge. She used the damage that Jen's belch caused as an excuse to change into costume and "investigate" her idol. Kara had long admired She-Hulk's confident attitude and tomboyish antics. The Hulk's cousin might have stood no chance against her in arm wrestling, but even Supergirl was amazed after hearing how Jen had managed to beat Wonder Woman herself in a belching contest. No one had done that before, not even Clark. Kara had come the closest up until now, but she'd been forced to surrender in the end.

The Girl of Steel wanted to ask about all that and more, to compare notes on superheroes and having to do so while occasionally being compared to one's own cousin. First, she knew she had to break the ice. The best way to do that? To showcase her own tomboy skills of course!

"It was awesome," Kara continued in a more casual tone, "but nothing compared to a real super belch. Check this out! BUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU-RRRRRP!"

Supergirl unleashed a belch of such proportions that it echoed into space. This lasted a full two minutes and filled the diner with an even more unpleasant smell. The Girl of Steel then looked at her hero and smiled nervously, waiting for a reaction.
11112.title: Slobby super cousins: She-hulk vs. Supergirl!

choices: She-Hulk wins! Time for another gas contest.
Supergirl wins! Time for another gas contest.
111121.content:
To Kara's shock, she found her idol on the floor and knocked out of Hulk form. An Irate Jennifer quickly transformed back into She-Hulk, now a little more muscular thanks to her anger-induced strength boost, and glared at the younger heroine. "Okay, Brat of Steel, you want to go? Let's go! It's dessert time!"

She-Hulk stomped into the kitchen and returned a few minutes later holding a massive armful of pies and cakes. Some were unfinished due to the diner having been evacuated and others were old and half-eaten for whatever reason. A confused Supergirl watched her idol place as much as she could on counter, then rear her head back. With a sickening snort, Jenifer shot a Hulk-sized Loogie into each pastry and took special care to let it slowly drip into those that were incomplete, as though she finishing the job in her own disgusting way. Supergirl was weirded out, but did her best not to show it. "Your turn." She-Hulk sneered at the younger heroine as she indicated the number of pastries that had been placed on the admittedly dirty diner floor. Kara nodded and spat into each one as disgustingly as she could manage, which was actually more grossness than She-hulk was capable of. The older heroine would've turned green with envy if not for...well, you know.

You see, in contrast to Supergirl's extreme admiration of her, enough to follow orders completely without question, She-hulk had nothing but disdain for any kryptonian with a big red "S" on their chest. It might have had something to do with the fact that Kara's cousin had relentlessly hounded her own about as far back as she could remember, or how the contrasting reputations of said cousins had prevented her from getting a spot in any branch of the Justice League. Some said it was because she was envious of Power Girl's boobs {behind her back} But She-Hulk herself would claim she hated Supergirl for being so arrogant and rude, the very worst example of a teenage superhero and teenage girl in general. It had nothing at all to do with the fact that Kara had quickly managed to surpass her in fame as both a Heroine and a sex symbol in almost no time at all, just as it most certainly had nothing to do with the fact that she'd been so easily and so vastly outbelched. No,not at all.

"Let's see if you can eat more of this 'special' deserts than me without throwing up." Jen challenged while proudly patting her already more than ample stomach. "Biggest gut wins."

"You're on!" Supergirl exclaimed happily, thinking this was the best way to prove herself to her idol. A now even more angry She-Hulk tersely counted down: "1...2...3...go!"

The two heroines began swallowing mouthfuls of mucus covered food as sloppily as they could from their respective areas. Supergirl's super speed gave her an early lead, but She-hulk made up for it by eating more aggressively. Spittle flew everywhere and mixed with snot and food crumbs as they spilled onto the diner walls. Eventually...
111121.title: the Stomach of Steel/Gamma Gut gross out!

1111211.content:
By the end of the disgusting food eating contest, She-hulk had collapsed to the floor, her gut now twice it's previous extended size and the rest of her covered in mucus, drool, and food remains. The slobby gamma heroine managed to lift her head and smirk as she observed Supergirl, now standing near the counter and throwing up her own portions in disgust. To top it off, the younger heroine's Kryptonian metabolism had prevented her from gaining even a small pot belly despite the immense amount of junk food she'd eaten. Jen had won the contest in every way possible, but still felt the need to rub it in a bit.

"Sorry Blondie, guess you don't have what it takes to hang with the big dogs after all." She-hulk pulled herself to her feet with some considerable difficulty and waddled over to give Supergirl a rough and condescending pat on the back. Supergirl was able to recover from vomiting in record and was already gazing at her idol with pleading eyes, still oblivious to the older heroine's animosity towards her.

"Please, Ms. Walters, give me a second chance! How about a farting contest?" Jen scowled and was about to give a rather nasty retort when she paused. The idea of humiliating the super brat even further with her awesome gamma gas was rather tempting and she had plenty of fuel to burn off from her binge anyway. The gurgling sounds from her huge green gut were already starting to sound like another gamma bomb explosion.

"Okay kid, it's your funeral. We may need new stomping grounds though. Thanks to me, this place needs at least two years' worth of fumigation already." The older heroine indicated the already foul smelling and messy diner around them to prove her point.

Supergirl nodded, but her face soon lit up. "My cousin is with the Justice League in space at the moment and his Fortress will be perfect! Come on!"

One super speed flight and a change of clothes for Jen later, the two heroines faced off in a special ring designed by Superman specifically for sparring with allies who could match his strength. There was even a protective force shield in place to prevent damage to the surrounding area. She-Hulk listened to the mighty roar of her still huge stomach one more time before staring down her unknowing rival.

"The nastiest, loudest and most powerful fart wins. No wimpy sbds allowed and let's try very hard not to soil ourselves, okay princess?" She-Hulk had meant to embarrass and anger Kara with the last comment, but the younger heroine merely laughed.

"Okay, I'll start us off!" Kara announced before unleashing a fart that made her cape flutter behind her in a parody of the standard hero pose. The smell was worse than She-Hulk anticipated, but she tried not to let it show. "Not bad kid, but top this!"

The gamma heroine bent down low and unleashed a far more massive fart that filled the arena with glowing green stink. She-hulk lovingly breathed it and laughed triumphantly. "Ha! ready to give up blondie?"
1111211.title: Atomic Fart Battle part 1!

111122.content:
It was plain Jennifer Walters who picked herself up off the diner floor, having knocked down and out of Hulk form by Kara's belch. The now normal lawyer still sported a big gut, though it was slighter smaller now and noticeably softer for lacking She-Hulk's muscle. This failed to make it easy to balance herself as she stood up to glare at the younger heroine. "What are you doing here, kid? I've got no time to babysit today!" Jennifer's harsh words made Supergirl flinch, saddened by her idol's rebuke. Truthfully, the older heroine was embarrassed at having been so easily out-belched, particularly Kara Zor-el. In contrast to the younger heroine's admiration for her, She-Hulk believed Supergirl to be an arrogant brat who had no business being a superhero. Whether this attitude stemmed from her dislike of Superman and the way that he and the rest of the Justice League considered the Hulk an evil monster, she would never admit.

Supergirl tried to counter this rebuke by acting aloof, hoping her attitude would impress. "I just wanted to show you how it was done. It's pretty sad that that was the best you could do, though not surprising with how little you can put away." Jennifer looked down at her deflated gut and scowled. "You think you can do better, blondie?"

Kara paused, considering what to say next. A challenge like this would be the best way to showcase her skills to her idol. "You be!. I can slob it with the best of 'em! You up for it...old lady?"

Jennifer's eyes glowed deep green and she immediately hulked out, her muscles and gut growing just a bit larger from her rage. "Bring it on, little girl!" Supergirl responded by flying off and returning with a quartet of food trucks in her super strong arms. Each one had been shut down due to poor food quality or abandoned due to some involvement in a super villain's scheme. Often it was some combination of the two, which was why they were somehow all fully stocked. The doors were opened at super speed and both heroines were assaulted by the noxious smells of expired food soaked in aged grease. Both took a huge whiff in an effort to seem tough and a lover of grossness. "Okay Jen, first one to finish and get the biggest gut wins." Kara challenged while trying not to sound giddy.

She-Hulk responded by jumping into the nearest truck and devouring a frier full of nothing but grease. It dribbled down her chin and splattered across her chest before she tossed it away and flashed a challenging smirk to Supergirl, daring her to top this disgusting display. The contest that followed was the most disgusting binge anyone would likely see, but in the end...

122211.title: Princess Peach

choices: Take a seat on one of these funny looking mushrooms and see if Mario comes...
Go down the river. Maybe someone down that way can help?
1222111.content:
{Originally written by Past Member 'pigslop' on The Slobverse}

Princess Peach was engaged in one of her many pastimes that wasn't being kidnapped, baking. Humming as she made the finishing touches on the cake, she was interrupted by a large crashing sound from her pantry. Going into abduction mode, she was about to scream "MARIO HELP ME!" when she realized that the crash wasn't followed up by fire, or laughing, or anything. Curious, she looked inside of the pantry.

There was a large warp pipe sticking out of the ground. Now where had that come from? It was a dark green, and covered with grime... The smell coming from it was rather unpleasant as well, the kind of thing she'd associate with actual sewers. Leaning over it to see how far down it went, she coughed, and found her grip slipping on the filth-slick pipe as she went head-over-heels and plummeted into it, screaming. As her screams echoed into nothingness, the pipe vanished into the floor like it had never been there...

*-*-*-*-*

She thought she'd been falling for hours when she finally splashed into the foul-smelling pool. Blinking her eyes open she sighed, looking down at her dress... It was ruined with disgusting stains covering it. Looking around, she tried to figure out where she was... She didn't know this zone. It was kind of like an underground tunnel, with a foul-smelling river leading into the cesspool she'd just crawled out of, and weird green-and-brown mushrooms covered the walls, glowing softly. There was something spraypainted on the side of the tunnel...

"Welcome to Slob Land? How strange..." Was Bowser behind this? Or some other villain? The princess carefully considered her next course of action.
1222111.title: Just Peachy

12221111.content:
{Originally written by Past Member 'pigslop' on The Slobverse}

It was probably best to just stay put. Wringing out her dress as best as she could, she took a seat on a putrescent mushroom that looked sturdy enough to hold her weight...

...Then gasped as the thing released a bunch of spores into the air with a sound like the world's largest whoopee cushion. Peach hacked as the noxious spores filled her lungs. "Ukh! Aggh! Gross! Koff, koff..." Hopping off of the toadstool, she staggered over to a wall... Which gave way, causing her to slide down a secret passageway. Skidding down the greenish slide, she came to a stop beneath a large pipe. Getting to her knees unsteadily, she leaned against another pipe for support. Hopefully this time her perch wouldn't give way. Though she still felt a bit dizzy, she soon regained her breath and saw that there was a valve on the pipe, with two settings other than the current closed one.

"Ugh... Slop... And Wash? How strange... I could certainly use a good wash, but..." Her stomach grumbled as gas slowly built up inside of it, one of the insidious effects of the spores she'd inhaled. There was something oddly compelling about the word Slop...
12221111.title: Pipe Dreams

choices: Seeing the source of the sound
12221112.content:
{Originally written by Writerstrike (51) on The Slobverse}

Peach begins her trek down the river, "Someone has to be here. All of this....stuff came from somewhere". As the princess traveled down the tunnel she had longed to just go back home, take a nice hot shower, and forget that this happened. But, her curiosity drove her to keep walking, "There must be something down here. A society, a species, a-" "*Crunch* *Munch* *Munch* *Gulp* Oh....yeah".

Peach stopped her movement, "What was that?" Loud smacking, chewing, and *bbbburrp*-belching could be heard at the other end of the tunnel. Peach picked up the pace as someone had to be there with answers. "Someone has to --ooo!" The princess nearly fell in the off-color slop before her. The current began to pick up the closer she got. "Better be careful." Closer and closer Peach had gotten to the sound of the voice, the current's speed began to rise, creating more worry for her to keep balanced.

"Almost...there". The fight against the river began to tire her out. Almost to the point of collapsing. Her feet began to ache and her hamstring tightened. But, not before---

12223111.content:
The peaceful hamlet of Pallet Town, a comparatively new human settlement in the souther half of the Kanto Region, constructed only a quarter of a century ago during the economic boom of the region’s development industry. The humble village is quite locally famous for the cheap cost of living and high quality housing, making it an attractive place to live if one were to negate it’s lack of job opportunity. It is also the official residence of one of the highest scientific authorities on all things related to Pokemon, Professor Samuel Oak.

It is in this sleepy, seaside village that the young Leaf Walker slumbers underneath the blankets of her bed. She let out a Murr of contentment as she woke from her deep sleep, accredited to a lone beam of sunlight trickling through her bedroom window curtains and sanding itself on her cherubic face.From the kitchen below, Leaf’s mother was already up and about, cooking up a slew of arterie clogging breakfast food made with generous helpings of grease and lard, the various smells creeping into every corner of the house.

Today was a rather special day for the long, brown haired Leaf. Today was the day that the official Pokémon League of Kanto designated as the start of this year’s Pokémon Journeys! Only so many children were allowed to become trains s each year, due to the scarcity of the starter Pokémon, so the league rations how many can officially become a trainer each year. Leaf was at an advantage to the close proximity her house was to Oak’s laboratory, but she was still anxious about not getting they're in time.

After around ten minutes of getting herself ready for the day, Leaf gave herself one last look in the mirror to see if she had missed anything important in her attire. Her plump lips curved into a smile as her trademark hat fell into perfect center on the top of her head. Her chipmunk-esqe cheeks bloated even further as she did so, a healthy shade of red forming as she looked herself over in the body mirror. Her signature double chin dropped down to her thick neck, bulging with blubber, already on the verge of a third. Her heaving bosom pokes out from her cropped, blue t-shirt, abundant flab squeezing their way out and over her bra cups.

Leaf’s eyes move down further to her large, globular blob of a stomach, completely exposed to the elements as her shirt gave up trying to cover it long ago. Thighs that could squeeze the life out of a baby Pokemon, a rear end as bulbous as sports balls; some might fall her appearance disgusting, to Leaf and her mother she was the sexiest girl in town. She filled her large breasts and gave them a rough, if not affectionate squeeze.

“Well, that’s the last of it!” The heavy Leaf gave a deep belly laugh as she grabbed her new trainer’s purse and headed out of her bedroom to the kitchen below.

“Good morning, Sunshine! Are you ready for your very important day?” Leaf’s mother heard her daughter come down the stairs, her weight making the old floorboards creak and moan. She gave Leaf a smile as she entered the kitchen, complete with an even plumper set of lips and extra chins than her daughter. Leaf’s mother was significantly more fat than the young girl by a wide margin. Her heaving chest was almost bursting out of the cooking apron she was wearing over an old white T-shirt, with enough side boob to choke a Riolu. Fortunately, her mammaries were supported by a shelf of belly blubber, a sphere of fat so large it brushed the tiled floor.

Leaf’s mother was the fattest women in the entirety of Pallet Town, although that wasent saying much considering the sparse population, and openly proud of her weight, always advocating that fat equates to beauty and tried to gain as much weight as possible. Naturally, Leaf was brought up in a similar fashion. The mother and daughter’s relationship flourished under the unified ideals of eating more food and having more fat on their sexy frames. To her mother’s eternal joy. Leaf’s biggest goal in life is not to become the world champion of the Pokémon League like the rest of the children her age...

Leaf wants to become the fattest women in the world, instead!

However, the local administration of The Kanto Region coerces children into being Trainers by offering very attractive benefits, forcing Leaf to sign up. She thinks that this is going to be a major obstacle into becoming the world’s fattest, what with all the walking and physical exertion, but little does she know that outside the borders of her hometown lies a whole buffet of tasty food to snack on! She just has to know where to look…

“Yep, as ready as I’ll ever be!” Leaf gave her mother a wide smile, while her tummy gave an ominous growl of hunger. “But I think my gut is more ready to have some food!” She gave her stomach a loving rub, appeasing the beast within. Her mother giggled, making her whole body jiggle and wobble with glee, to which Leaf eyed with a taint of jealousy. She promised herself that one day she would outgrow her mother, and at the rate she’s going, that day might be soon...
12223111.title: Heavy Leaves

122231112.content:
“Leaf, dearie, don’t forget to head to the lab sometime this year!” Leaf’s mother reminded in between rapid spoonfuls of fattening food. The two obese women sat at opposite ends of the kitchen table, itself struggling to remain upright under the weight of the greasy foodstuffs. Each of them feasted on the lardy bounty with abandon and without shame.

“Mrph...I got it...just one last plate...they're!” Leaf forced down the last of her food and set her utensils down on her even larger gut. Sticky sweat ran down the forehead of the obese girl as she raised her puffy arms over her head and leaned her wide back in the reinforced chair. What started out as a simple going away breakfast devolved into a two-hour long feeding frenzy. While Leaf was done eating, her mother still had room in her impressive gut.

“Geez, mom, whatever you did with those pancakes, make sure you cook ‘em like that from now on!” Leaf drummed the taut surface if her gut as she stood up from her chair.

“Mmm, I found a special brand of MooMoo milk that's 30% fat instead of just 2%. I thought I could break it out for your special day.” Leaf’s mom said, shoveling more of the food down her throat. “Now go on and get to Oak’s lab, you’re late as it is!”

“Alright mom, I love you!” Leaf gave her obese mother a hug as she kept eating. She grabbed her PokeGear and headed off from her childhood home to Professor Oak’s lab at the edge of town…

...but as she walked, she noticed something strange. Normally, they're would be a crowd of a hundred kids around the entrance to Oak’s workplace and residence, but right now it was noticeably empty. Did it get cancelled? That would certainly be a bummer. Leaf knocked loudly on the door of the Lab, wanting some answers.

“Ah, Leaf Walker.” Professor Oak greeted the fat girl as he opened the door. “So, you decided to show up after all, eh?”

“Hi Professor Oak!” Leaf greeted cheerily. “I’m here for my Pokémon! And, hey, do you know why they're’s such a low turnout this year?” She gestured to the emptiness around the property.

“...Leaf.” Professor Oak sighed. “It’s over. I’ve already given away all of the Pokémon.”

“Wha...what?!” Leaf cried in shock and horror. “N-n-no, that can’t be right, it just can’t be! You have to at least ONE Pokémon left, right?!”

“I’m sorry, Leaf, but I-“ Oak cut himself off as he remembered something that might help the young girl’s situation and did him of a rambunctious nuisance. “Well...I do have one left, but it wouldn’t be a very traditional starter, mind you.”

“You have one? Yes! I’ll take it. I don’t even care what it is, I’ll take it!”
122231112.title: Leaf eats untill she’s full, Oak has plenty o...

1222311122.content:
“Look out world, here I come!” Leaf let our a proclamation of pride as she bolted ou the door of Professor Oak’s laboratory. In her hands was the Pokeball that contained her new best freind, Eevee. The good professor explained to Leaf that it was Lv. 1 and currently knew no moves. It was orphaned at birth after it’s parents saw that it was a shiny, and Oak had took it in, trying to get a good home. Unfortunately, the poor thing is terrified of most everyone, and is too young for anyone’s taste as a pet.

Unfortunately for the abandoned Eevee, Leaf wasent listening to a lick of what Professor Oak was saying about it. She was just too excited to finally get her first Pokémon! Since her greatest ambition in life is to become as fat as possible, she never really put any effor into learning about Pokémon. But she didn’t care, she would just wing it like he gut told her. And her gut was rarely wrong about anything.

Leaf ran out of the front door of the lab at lightning speed, despite the fact that she was an obese teenager who had just finished eating a double digit course breakfast, towards the first entrance to route one. In her rush, however, she had completely forgotten to grab the set of sjx complementary Pokeballs from The good Professor. “Leaf, w-wait up! You forgot your…” he called out to the fat teen, but she was too caught up in her own world and too far away to hear him. Oak sighed, knowing that he was powerless and walked back into his lab, hoping that the girl would manage without any means of capturing Pokémon.

“Wow, I feel amazing!” Leaf cried with a happy smile. “Where did all this energy come from? It’s like I can keep going and never stop!” And indeed, Leaf did not stop, at least for untill a long while had passed. She bolted through Route 1, completely ignoring the other trainers that wanted to battle with her, breaking the unspoken rule of when two trainer’s eyes meet, they must battle.Leaf ran for a solid thirty minutes before not her stamina pooped out, but her stomach signaled that it was done digesting and hungry for more food.

Always the one to trust the whims if her stomach over everything else, Leaf reasoned that now was the perfect time to take a little break from the road. She sat her fat ass down a neighboring tree stump and fished her only Pokeball from her purse. The Pokeball was tossed into the air and onto the ground, releasing a Snow White Eevee. The incredibly blubbery girl could not help but smile as she looked down at her new freind, totally oblivious to the reactions it was making.

Just a couple of hours ago, the Eevee was in the warn and comfy hands of the elderly Professor Oak eating his light breakfast. Now he was a long way from home in a different environment in the care of a stranger who looked as fat and as intimidating as a Snorlax. It was obviously scared, but Leaf refused to pick up on it.

“Hello they're, Eevee. My name is Leaf, and I’m you’re new best freind! Are you hungry lil’ guy? Because I know I am!” Leaf greeted her Pokemon and smacked her empty belly hard, making the dome of pale flesh quiver and wobble.

“Eevee E…” the confused Pokémon whimpered.

“Aww, I can’t understand a word you’re saying, silly!” Leaf giggled teasingly. “Looks like someone’s gonna have to learn English~.”

“Vee…” the Snow White Pokemon cried softly.

“Now, time for a well deserved lunch!” Leaf opened her purse t see what kind of food her mom packed her for the road...only to discover a distinctive lack of anything edible within. “...no, no they're’s no way she forgot!”

Leaf turned her purse upside down and let the contents fall to the ground. She daw nothing but makeup, her cellphone, a diary, and s high of other trainer stuff that she did not care about. They're was no food, and right on cue her bloated tummy cried out in agony from being deprived of proper nutrition for so long. “Oh Arceus…” The portly girl grasped at her black hole of gut. “It hurts so bad...I can’t go out like this!”

“E...Eevee…?” The shiny Eevee tilted it’s head at the interesting display his new master was making. Was it some kind of mating ritual? Rain dance? Whatever it was, it was freaking him out and he wanted nothing to do with it.

1231233321331.content:
The young bride-to-be Susan Murphy’s wedding day had taken a turn for the worst. For starters, she was struck by a meteorite. Then at the altar, she began to grow, but not in height – in weight.

Her appendages thickened with flab but also built an equally thick layer of muscle underneath, soon reaching a diameter of 1 foot. The same thing happened with her fingers and toes, except they were only twice as wide as before. White replaced the brunette in her hair and her facial cheeks swelled with fat. She gained a second chin as her neck vanished in a coat of fat. The ivory wedding dress stretched and tore as her melons grew to the size of actual melons and her ass inflated to rival basketballs. Sue’s navel popped outward as did her stomach, until it approached the size of medicine ball. By the time her transformation had concluded, all of the attendants had already fled the church, including the groom.

Ms. Murphy gasped as tears swelled in her eyes. Before she could start the waterworks, a group of military personnel rushed into the nigh vacant room and launched a powerful sedative at her. It nailed in the thigh and Susan’s vision & hearing blurred before she blacked out.

--

Susan could only see darkness and heard an alarm go off.

“Honey, could you hit the snooze?” Susan asked groggily. She turned to her other side and tried to drown out the noise. “Baby, why did you set the alarm? We're on our honeymoon.” She continued before falling to the floor.

The woman raised her head and looked around her. She was in a dark area that flashed red. What was behind her was a large gray bed with a white pillow that she’d presumably fallen off of. Gazing upward, Sue saw a blinking crimson alarm. Observing her outfit, she could tell that she was wearing a snug long-sleeved dark grey jumpsuit with orange stripes on her shoulders and the side of her legs. There were orange-colored pockets on her breasts, the number ‘00005’ just above the left pocket and an orange ‘?’ sign on the side of her upper right arm. Although she couldn’t see her feet, they were covered in orange and white Converse sneakers.

“Hello? What's going on?” She question before she saw her bed retract into the wall.

Then, a metal door slammed shut on the other end. A small cranking was heard before the room shifted down like an elevator. Susan felt her padded belly, butt, and breasts wobble as bright, white lights shined briefly through a glass window in the door. Susan crept up to the opposite wall in fear before the room suddenly stopped, the laws of physics dictating that she drop to the floor again. The beeping and flashing ceased as well and the alarmed receded into the ceiling. The weighty woman still shook like a lost puppy, until a whirring sound occurred followed by the opening of the door. Ms. Murphy could see a massive light grey area lit by several ivory lights. She could just barely make what appeared to be two tables. Immediately afterwards, the wall that Sue leaned on pushed her into the new room, her frightened stammers not stopping it. She panted heavily when it did stop, then got up and cautiously waddled around.

“Hello?” She called out, the door shutting once more behind her. She made her way to the tables before hearing something faint.

“Is it just legs? Did they capture a giant pair of legs?” A voice asked.

“Silence, B.O.B! She'll hear us!” A second voice stated.

“How? Legs don't have ears.” ‘B.O.B’ replied.

“Just shush!”

Sue motioned toward the source of the sound with more caution. “Hello? Is there someone there? Could you tell me where I am?” She inquired.

Another strange sound emanated from the center of the room, which made Ms. Murphy whip her head back toward the table. There, a thin tube dispensed beige mush and a spoon onto the larger one with a metal coffee mug before retreating out of sight. The fat-laden maiden went back to the table and grabbed the spoon. For some reason, she found the oatmeal-looking slop rather appetizing. However, she turned her head away when she heard the sound of tiny pitter-patters on the floor.

“Hello? What was that?”

Trying to refocus on the oddly tantalizing slop laid before her, Susan took a seat on the reinforced steel bench near the table, her ass overflowing the seat that could fit two. She then heard the same noise again and it was louder this time. She turned around once more and the next thing that she saw almost made her faint.

“Hello.” The creature greeted with a bow.

“Ew!” Susan responded before clutching her gut in pain.

She felt a cluster of gas worm its way up her throat. Despite covering the only vent it had to leave, the pressure soon became too much.

"*BBBBBUUUUURRRRPPPPPP!*"{ /size}

The monster was fortunate to duck out of Sue’s general direction as the power burp blast broke the sound barrier and smashed into the super steel wall, leaving a 49’ 11” wide hole in it. Susan's face turned tomato red in embarrassment.

“Whatever mad scientist made you... he really went all-out.” The bug-man complimented, peaking his head out from behind Susan’s table.

“You can talk.” Ms. Murphy said in disbelief.

“Missing Link, when did we get a hole installed?” A man-sized blue mass of jelly with one eye questioned, arriving with a green fish-ape.

“We didn’t B.O.B. That was the work of the new girl.” The fish-ape corrected.

“Forgive him, but as you can see, he has no brain.” Dr. Cockroach commented about B.O.B.

“Turns out, you don't need one! Totally overrated! As a matter of fact, I don't even have to... *gasp* I forgot how to breathe! Don't know how to breathe! Help me, Dr Cockroach! Help!” B.O.B. pleaded loudly.

“Suck in, B.O.B.” Dr. Cockroach told, exasperated.

B.O.B. then started to breathe normally. “Thanks, Doc. You're a lifesaver.”

“Might we ask for your name, madam?” The Doctor asked.

“Susan.” She replied.

“No, no, no, we mean your monster name. What do people scream when they see you coming? You know, like 'Look out! Here comes...'?” B.O.B.

There was a moment of silence.

“Susan.” She answered.

“Really?” Dr. Cockroach responded.

“‘SUUUUSAAAN!’” B.O.B. repeated spookily. “Ooh, I just scared myself! That is scary!”

Before the conversation could further develop, a door over 350 feet tall opened partially. Out of the darkness appeared a man on a jetpack.

“Monsters. Get back in your cells.” He ordered.

The three smaller ones begrudgingly obeyed, walking toward three open doors that soon closed afterward.

“Oh, thank goodness! A real person!” Murphy exclaims in relief before noticing his jetpack. “You are a real person, right? You're not one of those half-person, half-machine, you know. Whatever you call those things?”

“A cyborg?” He replied dryly.

“Oh, no! YOU'RE A CYBORG!” The 350 pound female shouted, panicked.

“Madam, I assure you I am not a cyborg. The name is General W. R. Monger. I'm in charge of this facility,” He explained before turning around. “Now follow me. It is time for your orientation.” Although, she was much hungrier after that burp, Susan reluctantly followed Monger out of the room and onto a moving pad. “In 1950, it was decided that Jane and Joe Public could not handle the truth about monsters and that they should focus on more important things like paying taxes, and so the government convinced the world monsters were stuff of myth and legend and then locked them away in this here facility.”

Another door opened, showing darkness. The pad that Sue was on lowered slightly before turning left. “But I’m not a monster. I’m just a regular person. I’m not a danger to anyone or anything.” As if trying to undermine Ms. Murphy’s argument, her posterior rumbled for a bit before shooting a supersonic air bullet that downed a faraway helicopter. “Sorry.” She apologized meekly before the pad moved upward and entered yet another door. “How long will I be here?”

“Indefinitely.” The General replied.

“Can I contact my parents?” Sue asked.

“No.”

“Derek?”

“Negative.”

“Do they know where I am?”

Monger turned to face her. “No, and they never will! This place is an X-File, wrapped in a cover-up and deep-fried in a paranoid conspiracy! There will be zero contact with the outside world.”

The pad entered another empty space, then turned right. After passing the monsters that she met earlier, they stopped at a closed door that opened to reveal a room similar to the one that Susie woke up in.

“Oh, and uh, one other thing. The government has changed your name to Slobica.” Monger said as the door closed behind Susan.

Night was settling on the forest and she needed to find shelter before the Queen caught up to her.

The sun dipped past the mountains and Snow White found a worn, beaten path. Sure that it would lead her somewhere safe, she followed the road for as long as she could. An elk that had been following her offered a ride on his back, which the tired girl was unable to reject. The road was becoming harder to see as the stars blinked into visibility. A shimmering pool could be seen out in the distance, surrounded by rather large lounge seats and recliners for its patrons. As Violet began to feel the sweat accumulate over her body on account of the humid weather, the thought of a refreshing dip seemed almost heavenly.

As they approached the water, Violet looked around for a place to change into her bathing suit. "Err, Mom, isn't there a restroom or a shower or something that I can---", she stuttered as her mother playfully pushed both her and Mirage in. Helen chuckled, "There'll be no need for that, now let's get this thing going!" while pressing a small button on a nearby pool console. Suddenly, a new current began to form in the pool. Violet turned to see a pipe expelling a murky, brownish solution from under the water, and gasped. "Wait, what is that stuff? What'd you do?", Violet nervously inquired as she paddled to the edge of the pool, only to notice that the drop off was too high for her to climb out of.

"This, is the Soak Pool! While you can *urp* swim and play and all that stuff, you can also get odorized with some of Slobnia's most *PHhhhhhhhhhhrt* famous scents," Helen explained, "I think today's batch is limburger cheese with a hint of skunk musk..." Mirage had already caught wind of the aroma and began to gag. Violet got a whiff of what smelled like one of the ripest farts she'd ever smelt and plugged her nose. "CANNONBALL!", shouted Helen as she threw herself into the pool, sending a tidal wave of sludge over the heads of her guests. Soon, all Violet could smell was the filthy water that seemed to coat her body by the second. Helen gave a sigh of relaxation and several large bubbles rose out of the water. It was then that the combined stench of the putrid bath and her mother's eggy fart sent her to blissful unconsciousness.

Violet dreamed. She was in front of a mirror staring at herself, unable to move as indistinguishable blobs of people approached her. They raised her armpits and pulled out a perfume bottle simply inscribed "Sweat" and began to spritz her entire body. Another one placed a spoon full of beans in front of her, to which she welcomed with an open mouth and consequently replied to with a wet, bassy fart. All the meanwhile, folds of flesh became more and more apparent as the perfume was applied and the beans were consumed that she soon saw a new curvy, heavyset girl with a green gaseous aura - a far cry from her old self. And then, Violet fell in love.

{Originally written by MageB (57) on The Slobverse}

Violet watched as her mother's rather generous backside wobbled back and forth into the living room Helen already leaving a trail of crumbs. The smell in the kitchen didn't improve much but Violet was still able to tolerate it, her mind focused on other matters. Violet nervously held her arm against her body concern for her mother beginning to over take her.

"Oh mom... What's happening to you?" Violet spoke softly

In his study Bob was running over every possible explanation he could think of. Being a veteran super hero his first conclusion was she might be a robot, his wife couldn't have changed that much in just a week. But then there is the matter of her smell and sweat, she produced biological secretions that seemed to complicated to mimic with any robot. It was possible this was some sort of deformed clone or impersonator sent to take Helen's place. But why kidnap someone only to send back a replacement that looked and behaved so differently.

Helen why did I ever force you on that vacation..." Mr. Incredible was kicking himself.

Bob needed to find his wife before anything happened to her he couldn't live with himself if he lost her to some villain trying to get to him. Pulling the GPS locator out of the drawer he tried to home in on the chip located in his wife's super suit. However to his dismay the signal placed her suit in the suitcase she had lazily left by the front door. Bob was at a lot for how to move forward from here, and he was a bit miffed to think whoever did this may have stripped his wife's suit off her to send back with this doppelganger.. assuming she was a fake.

Bob Wanted to march right in the living room and apply his super strength to this person claiming to be his wife and demand an explanation. But he was at a loss for more information, this could be some unwitting actress, but Bob was so filled with rage that something had happened to his wife he could almost care less if he rung the neck of some innocent accomplice. And then there was the slim chance this was his wife, and they had done something terrible to her, whoever 'they' were...

He had one option to fall back on but he hated to take it, Mr. Incredible would prefer to solve his own problems but this was his wife and there was nothing he wouldn't do for her. Pulling a small red card from his wallet Bob began to dial the number on the back. After one ring a monotone voice answered.

"Hello You've reached the hotline for cupid's flowers deluxe, we're sorry but we are currently experiencing a shortage from our suppliers, if you would like for us to contact you when we can-"

Bob fumbled with the card holding it to the light to see secret messaged watermarked between the layers of card "Um.. I...oh, I just needed to know your rates for... Calla Lily's"

There was a pause before the emotionless voice continued "I'm sorry but those flowers are not offered in this region, perhaps we could interest you in a different flower..."

Bob scanned the card again with the light behind it "That's fine any flower will do provided you can promise me a speedy delivery"

There was a click as the password was accepted. After the incident involving Syndrome the government had set up a small division to handle the supers exclusively, keeping them in contact and providing assistance should any more super villains surface. Bob waited a moment for someone to pick up.

"Hello Please state your superhero identity and number for verification" a feminine voice answered

"Mr. Incredible number 35773" Bob replied

"...Mr. Incredible?" The voice sounded surprised

Bob took a moment before he recognized the voice "Mirage?"

"Ooh, you remember me" Mirage cooed

"You're the liaison for the supers and the government?" Bob was a bit shocked to hear Mirage wasn't in a prison for her collaboration with Syndrome despite his recommendation that she was helpful in bringing the super villain to justice

"Yes they offered me this position to make up for helping Syndrome with his schemes.." Mirage sighed "What do you need assistance with Mr. Incredible?"

"My wife!" Bob suddenly remembering the urgency "I think she may have been kidnapped, or changed or.. .I don't know.." Bob trialed off still in the dark what he was dealing with

"Ok, slow down and try to explain to me, what happened? Mirage tried to calm him

"I don't know... She went on the trip and she or whoever that maybe came back... Different" Bob sighed in frustration "If it's her then she's not herself, her manners and attitude has changed and she's clearly heavier than when she left. She's so different and there's something... wrong with her or it or... I don't know!" He bellowed losing his patience

"I see..." Mirage slowly thought "I'll see what I can do for you. Unfortunately all of our agents are in London, Edna Mode contacted us just yesterday under suspicion her new fall line was going to be stolen by some villain calling herself 'the super model' so we are a bit short handed. To be honest I'm the only one in the office today but I'll see what I can do about getting you some more information"

"Yeah...Thanks" Bob said defeated, knowing his wife may be in danger and there was nothing he could do for her was killing him.

Meanwhile Helen had raided the kitchen for everything she could find. Wrappers and empty boxes were everywhere. Helen stood in the middle of her rampage with a satisfied smirk on her face as she looked over the mess she had created. Letting out a loud belch She checked the fridge once more. Stretching one chubby elastic arm behind her to scratch her massive behind all that was left was the half eaten hotdog she had brought back. Giving it a knowing smile Helen stood up and grabbed her car keys and headed out the door for more food, one last blast of gas erupted from her monstrous ass as she strutted her smelly flab toward the car.

As Mrs. Incredible's car pulled away a camper in a van parked at the corner of the street observed her. Inside two rather bloated women in skin tight leather stealth suits stained with food and covered in sweat seeping through the material watched with great care. One of them a blonde wearing glasses weighing close to 470 pounds turned slowly her bulk pressing against the monitoring equipment that was installed on either side of her and pressed a red key on her panel.

"[Urrrrp] Nineteenth hour of observation has passed, subject has been in contact with family for six hours and fifteen minuets" She paused and let out a strong sigh "still no indication that DNA encoding has taken effect."

The other woman a young brunette with short hair and southern accent weighing just under 305 pounds glanced back at her for the go ahead to follow, after a small nod from her partner in the back she started the engine and began to tail Helen's car.

"Are you sure we shouldn't stay?" She spoke up while driving "That call we observed from her husband to the government agency may be a problem if they intercept her when she gets home."

"All the more reason to stay with her now" The woman in back replied "If they plan a trap for her return we'll spot it before she is in danger. Now keep your eyes on our target Agent Six, she's making a right turn"

Agent Six turned in time to see the car ahead of them take a right and pulled over into the turn lane just in time to keep with her. "How do we know the encoding took no effect, She responded to the slobbification more aggressively than any other subject, plus she did bring back some of the food for her daughter." She reached over and grabbed a handful of donuts to cram into her mouth.

"True she was highly receptive to the slob changes, but those were just enhancements to basic human traits. All of our other subjects were average women, Elastigirl was our first 'super's subject we were brash to assume the results of the slob changes would carry over into the DNA encoding." The other woman scanned her notes" She's shown no desires to recruit other supers beyond sharing her new affinity for food with her daughter. Clearly her super DNA created anomaly in the encoding process. All the women back in 'the city' took to both the slobbification and encoding to give them the desire to share their changes with those around them."

"Yeah but after how long it took to locate a super and find her secret identity we didn't exactly have the luxury of waiting of holding her for observation like all the other women we've recruited[Phhhhhrt]" Agent six reasoned and let out a loud fart "We had a very small window to keep her for the process. With no other supers to test on we either find a way to activate the DNA encoding or wait till she leads us to another super to test on. Any word from the organization on a possible solution Threebie?"

"That's Agent Three..." The other woman growled and picked up a meatball hoagie "They said their working on the analysis from the tests of the samples we got from her. Still no word on any breakthrough, just continue observation and hope she suddenly has the urge to bring all the other super women a 'hot dog' like she did for her daughter [BRRRAAAAAAAP]" she belched and took another bite.

Mrs. Incredible arrived at the grocery store and headed inside grabbing two shopping carts. The van following her pulled up to the front of the store and both women quickly jumped out. Inside Helen Parr left a trail of drool on the floor as she looked at all the food around her. Working her way up and down each aisle leaving a rather strong odor in her wake. Both carts began to fill with all the sugary treats and junk food Helen passed. Empty wrappers and crumbs fell to the side as Mrs. Incredible couldn't help but indulge as she shopped. Helen threw an arm load of ice cream cartons onto the top of one of the monster piles of food and picked the last one out of the freezer peeling off the top and scooping out a handful for herself dribbles of melting ice cream running down her chin.

As she neared the front of the store Helen took note of a few women beginning to enter the front doors. It seemed like some of the ladies coming in were more... likeable. Helen couldn't place her finger on it but these women seemed more trustworthy. Their shirts were tight, some even straining the buttons of their blouse. Most of them were in the 140-190 weight range but they were all wearing clothing they had begun to outgrow. Most were beginning to show the start of sweat stains and a quiet belch could be heard from one or two as they moved into the store with a hungry look in their eyes. Helen didn't realize it but she was beginning to prefer the company of women who understood the value of a good meal and knew how fun the reproduction of such gluttony could be.

The cashiers broke from their stares of these odd women entering the store to gasp at the two overloaded carts Elastigirl was struggling to push. Several bag boys tried to assist her but the smell of Helen's B.O. as she worked up an even greater sweat trying to move her carts sent them reeling as they gagged and gasped for fresh air. Helen started off upset she might be burning precious calories with her exertion but after seeing how much the effort was building up her natural musk she decided she could live with it. Slinging an arm length's or sweat off her brow and onto a horrified cashier on the next checkout lane Helen began to unload the mass of food still unable to keep herself from munching on some of it as she did.

The girl at the counter tried to hold her breath but it was no use there was to much to ring up and the stench seemed to invade her nostrils even without taking in air. She tried to ring up the food as fast as she could to get this slob away from her. Helen noticing how little respect she was getting took a bite of her garlic breadsticks and let out a loud belch right in the young girl's face. The poor girl retched in response jerking back away wanting to run, but her manger quickly approached with a clothes pin on his nose and pointed her right back at the register. Helen smirked as the girl turned around and placed her hand on the next food item. Helen let out several noxious farts and burped once more as she picked food from the carts to munch on as she emptied them. By now the girl working the register was so desperate to get her out of the store she had begun to just grab arm loads of the food and drag them across the scanner barely reading one or two of the barcodes. By time the carts were empty and all the food moved past the scanner Helen barely ended up paying for even 1/10 of the food she had picked out. Ringing up the obviously incorrect total of seventy dollars Helen began to pull out her check book.

"No no!" The girl blurted out before thinking "Uh, here!" The girl quickly pulled seventy dollars from her purse under the counter and placed it in the till. "There, you're paid up!"she smiled nervously praying the disgusting blob would leave.

"Than-[Braaaaaaap] you" Helen smiled and grunted letting out a series of gas blasts as she tried to build up momentum to push her carts out of the store.

Outside the two agents of slob were standing behind a several fold out tables lined with food.They had peeled off the skin tight suits and put on more casual outfits both dressing in a blue blouse with pale blue button up vests and short blue skirts that were so tight on their corpulent bodies it was a wonder they even managed to get them on. Agent three wiped some sweat away from her eyes "Do you have your lines ready? She should be finished shopping soon"

"Yeah, [Urrrrrp] hopefully this will get her started on the right track" Agent Six replied and turned to another customer trying a jelly donut from the table.

The lady trying the donut took one bite, the sweet yellow filling squishing out and onto her cheek. After just a few moments the woman's eyes lit up and she inhaled it. She gladly purchased two bags worth of donuts and candy bars from the two obese women along with several pies. As she headed into the store to purchase the rest of her shopping list she took a few more donuts from the bags and enjoyed them. By time the woman had reached the second sliding door and entered the store the seems on her pants were already started to frey.

"One good thing about the data we collected from elastigirl" Agent six smiled as she watched the woman disappear into the store her body already beginning to swell causing her to jiggle and her clothes to grow tighter and tighter as her panty line became visible through her pants. "The study of how a super's altered DNA reacted to the chemicals that induce weight gain sure helped us to boost the effects on everyone who eats them. I think we've doubled the effectiveness of the compound since Miss Parr returned home."

"Time to find out if it reacts even better with our gracious benefactor" Agent Three nodded to the door as the bottom heavy Helen came out.

Helen zoned in immediately on the table covered in food and gladly took the detour away from her car with the heavy carts in tow. Helen drooled as she looked over the table scooping up a cherry pie before even asking if they were for sale and without even aknowledge the two women behind the table. Helen moaned in joy as the rich taste danced on her tongue. Helen looked to the two ladies smiling at her, they were both fatter than her and covered in sweat as the blond on the left let out a fart. Helen could smell them the moment she left the store, Helen couldn't help but think these traits made both these women very likeable and already she liked them even before saying.

"Helwo" Helen mumbled through a mass of pie already stuffing the rest into her mouth and licking the pan clean "[Urrrrp] These are really good" She smiled and grabbed a few clair to stuff in her mouth.

She used to be peeved at being flat chested, but now that she finally had some weight upstairs, the rest of her body had to draw the eye away from them!

As the disorientation that one feels upon waking up faded away, memories of last night began to filter into Violet's head in rapidly sharpening clarity. Her mother did this to her, and it was changing her! Violet ran a testing hand through her hair. Having gone unwashed, it was starting to become oily. Violet willed herself to throw on sweatpants and a sweater (It was altogether too warm for one, but it was the only thing that fit halfway decently!) and to apply deodorant. As she was stroking the stick underneath her arms, she had a pang of panic, as if she were on a roller coaster that had just reached its highest point before the drop. The deodorant felt sticky, unpleasant, and downright gross under her arms. Trying to ignore that she was passing gas again, Violet grabbed her books and vowed that she would march past her mother and whatever temptations she offered, get on the school bus, and try and figure out what to do next over the course of the day. She thanked the universe for her powers of invisibility, as she would rather not give her classmates more opportunities to guess how fat she had gotten than were absolutely necessary.

Violet stepped into the kitchen to observe a smorgasbord of breakfast delights strewn on every available surface...except in a 10 foot radius around her mother, who was still in nothing but a nightgown and panties as she greedily rolled five or six pancakes into a cylinder, crammed them into her mouth, then proceeded to drink from an uncapped bottle of syrup. "But...ummm...uhhh" Violet just didn't know what to say, the resolution she had made to herself just seconds ago now forgotten. In the back of her mind, Violet noted her breath was kind of strong as she stammered; she had forgotten to brush both last night and this morning.
Violet mentally told herself that she stopped in shock at the image of her mother, but part of her knew she was really paralyzed by how delicious the buffet looked. In fact, her mom's flabby, layered pear shape was almost kind of graceful looking...if you got past the fact that she was so gross! Violet's mind was going all over the place.

Breakfast burritos, clearly overstuffed with meat and cheese, over-sized pancakes and waffles, heaps of bacon, fat-laden T-bone steaks, all manner of sugary fruit juices, and package upon package of butter beckoned to Violet's increasingly ravenous appetite. My little girl put on such a great foundation last night, now its time to build!" She half-sang in a maternal voice. {Originally written by Past Member 'ryu19' on The Slobverse}

Gym. Violet looked down at her ever softening form and the sweat that clung to her body. If she got winded from a mere walk from the bus what would gym class do to her? Still she figured some exercise might be good for her.

The locker room was filled with Violet's fellow seniors, some of them sniffing as their noses caught a rank stench coming from Violet as she passed by them. Violet quickly changed into her gym outfit, thankful that her clothes still managed to fit her, even if her tummy was pooching out a fair bit.

A few minutes later she was out on the hardwood floor, waiting for the instructions from her teacher.

"Alright class we're going to be doing some good old fashioned laps today. Get your rears in gear and give me ten laps around the basketball court!"

The more eager students complied at once while the slackers merely rolled their eyes and started on a light jog. Violet decided to run as fast as she could from the outset. But she had hardly made it halfway around the court before she stopped, stooping over and holding her knees, panting heavily as sweat stains started to appear underneath her armpits.

Violet didn't have time to notice them however, as the teacher's whistle echoed throughout the gym.

"Get a move on Parr!"

The eighteen year old then resumed her run, her breathing becoming heavier and heavier the farther she managed to put one foot in front of the other.

Meanwhile with Helen....

The oven dinged right as Helen managed to scarf down some of her breakfast burritos, the increasingly slobby super getting up and waddling towards the kitchen. Opening the oven, the smell of the freshly baked brownies wafted towards her nose and she started to drool. Once they were out of the oven and cooled down, she snatched up two and shoved them into her mouth, chewing with abandon as flecks of the treat landed on her cleavage.

Not that she cared of course.

"I better eat something else. Don't want to waste all of these," Helen said aloud. It wasn't from some diet that those words came. Helen had crushed some of the onions she still had from the hot dog those kind women had given her earlier and sprinkled them over the brownie mix. A plate was all that she needed and maybe to clean herself up just a little.

Then she'd be ready to go to her neighbors, the only ones usually home at this time of day housewives and mothers like herself.

She hoped they'd all love her brownies.

And with a massive fart and scratching her ever increasing ass, Helen went to take a bit of a nap before heading out to spread some of the lovely food she had been introduced on her vacation.
12332331122222121121.title: Gym, short shorts and sweaty sports

123323311222221211212.content:
{Originally written by rdcottage on The Slobverse}

Helen was worried about violets resistances to becoming a slob. As Helen looked at her food she had prepared and got an idea. If she couldnt get to Violet her friends could. Helen knew that Violets two best friends mothers lived just down the street. Helen decided to pick up her conventions and walk over to their houses. Helen left the house in the same pair of clothes she had been wearing for the last couple of days. Her plain white t-shirt had multiple food stains and wet arm pit stains which let off bad BO. Her elastic pants were not much better they were stretched to their limit with a wet stain right along her butt crack. Helen bring a slob didnt care as she arrived at the first house. She gave knock on the door and waited. Julie the mom of Violets first friend opened the door. Julie was a blonde woman who was slightly overweight. She had been beautiful when she was young but let herself go after having a couple kids. Julie took a moment to recognize who this fat smelly women was but then recognized her face. Helen oh hi how are you doing she said a little awkwardly. She placed her hand on her nose to try and stop the smell that was coming from Helen. Hi Julie I just wanted get someone to try my food that I have been cooking. Julie personally just wanted Helen to leave but then she could smell beyond Helens body odor to smell the Food Helen was carrying. Julie stomach rumbled, she was on a diet and had not eaten anything in a while. Ok Helen Ill help you out Julie said but only for a little while Betty is coming over. Good that cuts down my work Helen thought to herself. Betty was the mother of Violets other friend. Helen placed down her food and got out a bowel of cookies.
