choices: Ms. Elderbrook checks on her before she can eat all the extra chocolate
Violet eats too much of it
12332331122222121122.content:
{Originally written by MageB (57) on The Slobverse}

A long tendril of saliva crested over the edge of Violet's bottom lip as images of a classroom filled with baked goods and yummy treats being placed side by side piled high upon decorative plates. A fuzzy feeling seemed to surround this daydream as if it was a comforting place to be surrounded by such sweet dishes. Violet shook her head and sent specks of saliva flying as she erased these images from her head. "No!" she steeled herself, home ec. was about the cooking not the wonderful delicious food they would be making. Violet snatched her book bag from the sink and held it to her chest as she hurried out the door and down the hall.

Within a few minutes Violet was stammering into home ec. her legs feeling like jelly after the dash to class. It wasn't terribly far but Violet was winded and worn out already considering she hadn't sat since she disembarked the bus in such a panic. Violet took her seat near the front like the good over achiever she was and wiped the sweat from her brow. A few more students filtered in and the last bell rang before the teacher stood and began her lesson.

"Good morning everyone!" Ms. Elderbrook chimed happily as she stood before them. She was a kind teacher, 5' 5" short light colored hair and a pair of pointy tipped glasses styled to look like like they were from the 50s. She was reasonably thin, she had been fairly petite when she took the position but with all the cookies and fudge and brownies she had to taste every period every day she had developed a small pot belly despite her daily trips to the gym to combat it. "Today is the day we put those skills to the test hmm?" She smiled brightly and started passing out recipe guides. "We will be each making a dish every day this week to present for the school bake sale this coming Saturday! Each of you will be making something different on each day I have you so we aren't all using the same cooking utensils at the same time."

Violet being one of the brighter students of the class as assigned to the role of lead cook for her group and got the sheet of what they would be preparing today. Violet's mouth filled with drool once more as she read the title "Marble Fudge Cake". A sharp class sounded through the class room as Ms, Elderbrook opened the curtain that separated the classroom from the kitchen ushering the children to stand and start cooking. Violet stared hard at the tantalizing image of the dish they were to prepare printed on the paper before her. Violet's group was already waiting for her when she got there eager to find out which dish they would be making today. Violet meekly handed over the paper slightly relived to to have it out of her sight for the moment.

"Oh boy these are really good!" Ashley exclaimed as she took the paper and showed it to the other two girls Violet was paired with. Ashley was blond with a red hair band parting her bangs from the rest of her hair, a little short but a well developed body already showing the promising curves she had developed and not an ounce of fat on her stomach.

"Yeah but they are hard to make!" Ginger frowned putting a hand on her hip "Marbling the fudge just right without mixing it too much can be a challenge" Ginger was a bit taller than the other girls with long brown hair down to the small of her back which she kept combed nice and straight and a large pair of round glasses to frame her face, like Ashley not an ounce of fat was to be found on her, if not for her modest B cup chest she would have looked as thin as a rail.

"Oh I wish we could have a slice!" Suzie giggled looking at the picture. Suzie was the largest of the 4, just under 180 pounds she looked plumper than she was due to her height being about as tall as Ashley. She had curly black hair she kept styled somewhat erratically as was her style of being slightly different from most girls with a hair band with a bow on it and large hoop ear rings and a sticker shaped like a star on one of her chubby cheeks.

"Not this time Suzie" Ashley smiled at their friend "Ms Elderbrook would throw a fit if we ate the food for the bake sale"

"I know I know" Suzie smiled back wishing she hadn't made the remark because of her status as the fat girl in the group.

"I'll get the pan for the cake so we can start, Violet you're better at chocolate than we are, I guess you can handle the fudge" Ginger said as she turned away from the work station.

The girls split up taking to their roles as Ashley and Suzie rounded up the ingredients and Ginger got the pots together. Violet tried to keep her focus on the work ahead as she started grabbing blocks of chocolate and breaking them up to put into her melting pot. Violet stared longingly as the creamy swirls of chocolate as she stirred the pot. Violet was hypnotized by the brown spiral before her, she just kept adding more and more blocks of it her focus growing more and more on the creamy goodness before her. Without realizing it Violet had melted nearly 5 blocks of chocolate when all she needed was 1 and a half for this recipe. Violet started to panic as the pot was almost too full in danger of spilling over as she stirred the chocolate to keep it from burning. Violet looked around to make sure everyone was distracted by their cooking, Ms. Elderbrook was showing one of the other students how to whisk a batch of lemon bar crust without throwing the flour and sugar everywhere as she added the butter.

Violet grabbed a spoon and dipped a large glob from the pot and tried to dump it back into the wax paper wrapper the bar had come from but most of it stuck to the spoon as the glob had begun to harden as soon as it came in contact with the cool spoon and left the larger pot of warm chocolate. Only a small dab hung off the spoon onto the wax paper. Violet bit her lip, she tried to use her other hand to brush it off but it just stuck to her fingers instead and the large pot overfilled with chocolate was in danger of burning what was on the bottom without constant stirring. Violet without thinking just jammed the spoon in her mouth and slid the chocolate off with ease with her tongue. Violet was washed over by that fuzzy feeling again as the chocolate melted in her mouth. It was so comforting the stress of her huge error seemed miles away and Violet's body relaxed the tension flowing out of her as food came to comfort her. Her hand didn't need to be told twice as she dipped it in the pot again and took another spoonful, then another and another. Violet's mind was at total peace and she didn't even worry about eating all the extra chocolate, she would find an excuse for it all be missing later, it wasn't important to her right now. Spoon full by spoon full Violet literally ate her problem away. Violet was so absorbed by her chocolate induced daze she wasn't paying any attention to anything else...
12332331122222121122.title: Bet you can't eat just one...

choices: Violet just runs...maybe Miss Elderbrook didn't notice her!
123323311222221211222.content:
{Originally written by SlobisCute (35) on The Slobverse}

Ms. Elderbrook smiled at her students as she made her way through the work stations checking on their progress. She looked over Ginger's shoulder at the cake batter she was mixing and gave her a nod of approval. Turning she looked to the stove where Violet was still savoring her chocolate daydreams.

"Remember constant stirring is the key to creamy chocolate Violet" she sang as she stepped up next to the young heroine.

A chill ran down Violet's spine as her teacher moved in next to her and looked over the work station before her. First Ms. Elderbrook took a good look at the chocolate pan before her with a critical eye, noticing the pithy amount of chocolate still left at her station. Violet cringed slightly as Ms. Elderbrook began scrutinizing the empty wrappers of the chocolate blocks, looking for the rest but not finding it.

"Violet..." She paused counting the wrappers "How many of these did you use...?"

"Uh, well, you know..." Violet tripped all over herself trying to regain her composure. "That is I... the chocolate... I used..." Violet's mind raced for a way out "I... used what the recipe called for!" slipped out of Violet's mouth as her stomach twisted into a knot and her body numbed with coldness. She knew there was no way to hide her crime and flat out lying was suddenly a less attractive option now that she heard how absurd it sounded coming out of her mouth.

"But your pan clearly has more than amount called for by the recipe" Ms. Elderbrook tilted her head slightly and opened her book to the recipes for that day.

"Three bars" Violet blurted out not even thinking before she spoke, her lack of a defense just left her on auto pilot. "That's how much I used when I bake this with my mom, I guess I didn't really pay attention to the recipe." Violet trembled with nothing to hide behind but her flimsy story.

"Oh" the young teacher thoughtfully mused. "You probably baked a layer cake with your Mom, I'm not sure how well this recipe would come out if all that chocolate was added...it would probably be inedible!" Violet leaped onto her teacher's comment for dear life. Feigning surprise, Violet put her hand to her cheek. "Oh! That's right, I completely got the recopies mixed up in my head, we baked a layer cake just last week!"
-----
Violet emerged from Home Ec with her shoulders slumped and her head in the clouds. There was no way Miss Elderbook didn't pick up on some serious hesitation, and her friends, while more dismissive of the missing chocolate, definitely shot her some looks that inquired of her mental health when she explained the situation.

To her horror, Violet found her concentration growing even fuzzier despite her sudden gluttony. A moment after sitting down, Violet could have sworn she smelled some sort of savory aroma wafting from nearby. At the end of English class, Violet had taken all of three lines of notes, then had proceeded to sketch a heaping plate of eggs and bacon as Hamlet's character synopsis. Realizing this as the bell rang, Violet cursed herself under her breath. "I need an A on this exam and I spent a half hour zoned out! Home ec isn't a big deal but if I mess up on this it's going to wreck my average!" Violet left the classroom anxious, ignoring that she was doing quite well in English and pretty much every other class. Violet wouldn't harp about it to her friends or parents, but she took a quiet but intense pride in her rather high average. While lapsing on a single test would barely affect it, Violet did not achieve her high marks in the first place through complacency. She would have to hit the books hard tonight, and then after that...

Violet's friends finally tracked her down; Violet had blown past their lunch table, clearly worried about something, emerged from the lunch line with a plate heaped with mashed potatoes and chicken fingers, sat at the closest available table, and began tearing into her meal as if she hadn't eaten in days. They gossiped amongst themselves as they watched her and had their plans of going up to her and asking what was wrong foiled as she dashed back into the lunch line as they approached. When Violet returned, she had yet another plate of food, and the look on her face was enough to make them decide it was best not to break her concentration.

...but if she took the time to read the last act tonight, would she be able to work all of her geometry problems? Not that her mom would care in her current state...what was up with mom anyway? What time was it?
Violet realized she had been daydreaming again. "It must be time for lunch." she thought. Glancing up at the clock in the hallway, her jaw dropped. Everything clicked into place. She had taken her lunch period...and overeaten. "But...I'm starving!" Violet whispered to herself. That was when the smell hit her again. She stopped cold, wheeled around searching for a source, then, eyes widening, Violet tore off her backpack and unzipped both compartments. Despite being nearly a half day old, the smell of the breakfast her Mother had stealthily packed for her was both strong and inviting. Violet noticed a little drool had fallen from her lips into her bag as she loomed over it, her belly pressing gently against the fabric of her sweater as she hunched over. Well aware that she had just eaten over twice the amount of food she normally did during lunch, Violet grabbed the paper bag from her backpack, grabbed the bookbag with her other hand, then sprinted off into the nearest girls' bathroom.

There where eight foodstuffs wrapped in foil and a thermos inside the paper lunch bag. Violet ripped open one of the smaller looking packages to find an extremely large cheeseburger. Despite being loaded with bacon, the sandwich held together in her hands, glued in place by generous amounts of lard. Violet inhaled deeply, knowing deep down that this meal would be different from cafeteria food; it smelled....real. It would fulfill her crazy appetite...for better or for worse. As her teeth sunk into the oily buns, an image of her mother, obese and gluttonous, too fat to do more than waddle around and eat, ran through her head, but the taste of the burger quickly rendered her powerless. She found her pace picking up, and unlike the cafeteria food, which she was shoveling down to fill the void of her hunger, Violet was enjoying every last bite of her current meal. After devouring her second course, a positively overstuffed breakfast wrap packed full of sausage and cheddar, Violet rapidly unscrewed the thermos. Hoping for soda, Violet was pleasantly surprised to find a milkshake. Despite the beverage being nearly as thick as molasses, Violet gulped down a quarter-thermos, tasting whipped cream and peanut-butter, finishing the motion with a refreshed "Aaaah!" For the first time since breakfast, Violet felt her stomach start to fill.

Positively flushed with pleasure and eager to enjoy the rest of her meal, Violet dashed into a bathroom stall, snapped the lid of the toilet down, and sat down to eat. However, before she could get very far into her next lard-bacon cheeseburger, she noticed she had begun to sweat; the heavy sweater she had worn from home to cover her new belly flab was a slightly weather-inappropriate. Ripping off the annoying garment, Violet noticed that the what tank top she had on under it had ridden up over her stomach. It also showed a bit of her newly developed cleavage. Violet cared extremely little about how unflattering her outfit was, however. Even as bits of ketchup, milkshake, and greasy egg dropped onto her shirt, Violet had not the slightest care for her appearance. By the time she neared the end of her meal, Violet's face had reddened and her perspiration had started up once more, indifferent to her scantily clad state. Sticking the last bit of cheeseburger bun into the thermos to sop up any remaining peanut-buttery indulgence, Violet finished her meal. She felt almost full, and totally satisfied. She brought a greasy hand to her now distended gut and caressed her midriff, more than a little relieved to not hear it roaring with hunger. Her greasy fingers coated her gut with an oily sheen, which, in Violet's hazy opinion, felt extremely nice. She sat there for a few moments, rubbing and admiring.

((( http://img408.imageshack.us/img408/2223/violet.jpg )))

Violet tried her best to get herself on her feet and out of the bathroom so she wouldn't miss more than half of her biology class. A smile on her face for the first time that day, Violet began to head down the hallway to the stairs, letting a little pent-up gas out with a belch. Her mind began to clear, and as Violet felt the slightest prick of a hunger pang returning, she began to wonder if she was forgetting something.

That's when Violet saw Miss Elderbrook staring at her, very perplexed, from across the hall...and when she realized she had forgotten to put her sweater back on.
123323311222221211222.title: Violet eats too much of it

choices: Helen lure's Violet back with the smell of her favorite meal cooking
1233233112222212112222.content:
{Originally written by MageB (57) on The Slobverse}

Violet stood like a deer caught in the headlights that was Ms. Elderbrook's shocked expression. A tense moment passed before Violet leaned forward and quickly tried to sprint away. Her packed gut bounced painfully up and down and she could feel the fabric of her sweatpants begin to make contact with itself between her thighs but Violet had no explanation to give to her teacher so she simply ran.

Ms. Elderbrook watched concerned as Violet started to run. She was worried why Violet had behaved so strangely in class earlier and now seeing her come out the bathroom flushed, covered in sweat, and a total mess, she was certain something was amiss with her pupil. Ms. Elderbrook called out to Violet and tried to follow.

Violet ducked around the corner, what was she going to do? Violet looked around for an escape but the hall stretched on classrooms on either side. Where could she go? If Ms. Elderbrook followed her she had nowhere to hide. Glancing over her shoulder Violet found that indeed her teacher was giving chase, again Ms. Elderbrook called out for her to wait. Violet had to get away, eventually her pursuit would draw attention and more people would see what a wreck she was. Violet cursed herself for giving into indulgence like she had. Now she was caught in a bind and exposed for everyone to see what she had become.

Then a light bulb went off in her head. 'That's it!' She thoughtlessly said aloud. If people couldn't see her, then her appearance wouldn't be an issue. Violet dashed for the next corner and cut into an alcove behind a row of lockers. Violet yanked her shirt over her head as fast as she could and stuffed it into her book bag with the greasy bag her food ad been in. Her bra and pants quickly followed as well as her shoes and socks. As crazy as it seemed Violet sat in the secluded row of lockers naked as the day she was born. Hearing Ms. Elderbrook's footsteps draw near Violet tossed her bookbag onto the top of the lockers and held her breath as she used her powers to render herself invisible.

Ms. Elderbrook neared the lockers and looked down the aisle as she passed. Violet was no longer in front of her so she must have been hiding in here. But even as she passed within just a few feet of the poor naked girl she still could not find her. Ms. Elderbrook continued searching as she left Violet behind and moved on to another hall.

Violet gasped for air as she exhaled finally, the chase had been so difficult she was red as a tomato now and more than out of breath. Violet retrieved her bookbag from atop the lockers despite her body crying out for a long break. However as she pulled them back out she found they were in worse condition now than before. Her shirt was crinkled and stained through and through with grease from the paperbag. What was worse the thermos leaked specks of peanutbutter and chocolate milkshake all over her pants and underwear. As Violet redressed she was a total mess with stain and grease from head to toe. There was no was she could go to her last 2 classes of the day like this. Violet took a look around to see if Ms. Elderbrook was still nearby and made a dash for the front door.

-----
It hadn't been easy, Violet had to hide outside near the bus stop until school let out. Fortune had smiled upon her and the buses were there before the bell rang so she was able to get in and move to the back before any possible classmates could see her. Violet rode until the bus came to her street and almost as fast as her brother ran down the alise and around the house on the corner never letting anyone get a good look at her exposed belly.

Once Home Violet was exhausted. She slumped down on the couch and sighed, worn out. Hearing the door open Helen knew her kids must be home. No sooner had Violet fallen into the embrace of the couch cushion, her mother entered the living room with a tray of greasy pizza rolls and cheese fries.

"Alright mom!" Dash shouted "After school snacks!" He hopped up and down excited to see a change in the usual 'healthy' options their mother gave for snacks. But before he could zip over to the tray Helen stretched the tray up to the ceiling far from his reach.

"Sorry Dash this is for Violet" Helen smiled at her energetic son. "But there's money on the counter in the kitchen. Why don't you run to the store and pick yourself out something"

"I'm getting fudgey bombs!" Dash yelled as the blur vanished into the kitchen and out the back door.

"Here you go sweetie. A nice snack to help you recharge after a long day at school" Helen softly smiled at Violet. There was quite a bit of pride in Helen's voice, looking at her Daughter in the food stained tank top and belly poking out from under it seemed like as big of an accomplishment as the straight A's Violet always had on her report card.

Violet's mind seemed to wash over with contentment seeing the tray before her. Without hesitation she leaned forward pressing her pot belly into a jelly roll and grabbed a handful of both the pizza rolls and fries in each hand. Violet let the fries rest on her stomach as she used her free hand to pick pizza rolls up and pop them in her mouth.

Helen as so happy to see her daughter eat that she reached down and gave the meager hints of love handles on either side of Violet's tummy a playful squeeze. "You've been such a good girl I'm making a special treat for you tonight!' Helen beamed and happily returned to the kitchen her flab shaking in step with her swift stride.

Violet looked back at the fries on her belly and started picking them off and gobbling them down. But in the back of her head she knew it wasn't her. As the last stick of fried potato left her belly leaving behind a string of half melted cheese that tried to cling to both the fry and her belly at the same time Violet took a good measure of her surroundings. Violet looked across her torso, she had slumped back when she began eating and could see the landscape of food stains that was her messy tank top with the cheese covered hill in the distance that was her belly. It was both captivating and terrifying at the same time. Violet's mixed emotions whirled about in her head. Violet looked around at the room, empty plates and discarded candy wrappers seemed to occupy every surface in the living room, every food item Helen had eaten in the last several days left behind some form of stain or packaging she had yet to clean up. And before her the tantalizing tray of fattening foods beaconed to her. Violet shut her eyes and tried to focus, why was she letting herself pig out on this crap?

Violet rolled onto her feet and tried to stand. Her tired legs protested but she forced the effort into them and stood. Against better judgment Violet grabbed a few more pizza rolls and jogged up the steps away from further temptation.

In the kitchen Helen had picked up the phone and dialed the number given to her by the two lovely women she had met outside the grocery store.

"Hi I would like to get some more products shipped to me from the city we spoke about yesterday" Helen let her free hand put a few chili dogs in the microwave. "Yes, I'd like to order some supplies to make a nice big dinner for my daughter." Helen shoved some cookies in her mouth while she waited on the microwave. "It's sort of a reward for... well it's difficult to explain but, I'm really proud of how she's let herself loosen up lately ya know? I don't know why but I really am proud the improvement her attitude has taken lately." Helen's finger taped the counter impatiently as the microwave continued to spin her chili dogs around and around before her. "Really? That's wonderful thank you so much! Yes it would be perfect for her! Thank you again" Helen hung up the phone delighted, she didn't know why but the ladies seemed to take special interest in the reward she had for her daughter. Just then the microwave let out a ding.
1233233112222212112222.title: Violet just runs...maybe Miss Elderbrook didn't...

choices: Helen coaxes dessert into Violet's stuffed form.
Violet manages to resist this temptation.
12332331122222121122222.content:
{Originally written by Past Member 'ryu19' on The Slobverse}

Violet managed to keep her mind off of food by focusing on her homework for English. But this reprieve lasted only a few hours, as a smell suddenly came to Violet's nose.

Sniffing, her nostrils flaring as she recognized the scent, Violet's growing stomach let out a growl. Swiftly shutting her open book, Violet got to her feet, images of the food waiting downstairs for her overpowering the conflicting part of her mind that told her to stop. Heading downstairs, she soon rounded the corner to find her mother, all two hundred and some odd pounds of her blocking Violet's way.

"Hungry Violet?"

Violet nodded, Helen pleased at the gleam in her eye and the not so little amount of drool spilling from her lips. Helen then moved aside and Violet approached the table, a wide grin on her face.

It was her favorite food: spaghetti!

It wasn't drenched in grease or appeared any more fattening than regular spaghetti but the scent...the scent went a long way in increasing Violet's hunger as she took in the creamy looking tomato sauce and the carefully arranged meatballs.

Not waiting any longer, Violet grabbed a fork, swirled up some noddles, and shoved it into her mouth. She didn't just plow through this bite in one go though, wanting to savor the hearty pasta, biting down and not caring a whit as some of it fell onto her tank top, adding more food to the already ruined article of clothing.

Helen watched as Violet plowed through the spaghetti, all the while eating her own meal of chili dogs and cheesy bread.

She was so proud of her daughter!

After dinner....

Violet was stuffed. Somehow she had managed to eat every bit of food her mother had given her, explaining her belly's current imitation of the globe. Groaning, Violet opened her mouth but the only thing that came out was a belch.

Helen, rubbing her much larger stomach, chuckled.

"That's so cute Vi, but don't hold it back. I know you have more in there!" Helen then preceded to let loose an even louder belch, the mother of three farting after that.

Violet was about to follow her mother's example when those conflicting thoughts from earlier in the day returned.

Wasn't this wrong? Wasn't she ruining her life by acting like this? Why was her mother so slovenly in her ways now? And why was she following after her?

Helen watched, a bit concerned, as Violet's expression went from painfully sated to concerned. Stretching out an arm, she rubbed Violet's stomach slowly, her mind already working up a solution to erase her daughter's concern.

"I was wrong Violet."

"About what?" Violet asked.

"You still have plenty of room for dessert!"
12332331122222121122222.title: Helen lure's Violet back with the smell of ...

choices: Follow Helen and Violet. (Bob and Helen have their talk.)
123323311222221212.content:
{Originally written by Past Member 'ryu19' on The Slobverse}

Violet's alarm clock rang loudly the next morning, the eighteen year old super quickly shutting it off with a quick force field.

Yawning a bit, she snuggled into her covers and went back to sleep.

Around 12:00....

Violet's eyes opened. Getting up, she rubbed her sleep-crusted eyes. Something felt off.

Looking down, she gasped as she noticed the newly gained weight from the previous night.

A part of her wanted to scream. Another part of her wasn't that discouraged by the gain.

It was the latter part that eventually won out and Violet got out of bed, deciding to not change out of her pajamas or take a shower that day.

There was always tomorrow after all.

Making her way to the kitchen Violet heard something sizzling along with a heady aroma of bacon. Her mom greeted her with a loud belch and Violet couldn't help but notice the weight her mother had gained as well.

"Good morning sweetie! Don't worry about school, I called and explained that you'd be taking the rest of the week off."

Violet knew she should be concerned about missing that much school, her being senior and all, but she found herself shrugging her shoulders.

"Thanks mom. What are you making?"

"French fries, bacon, hamburgers, hot dogs, and I think I put some burritos in the microwave," Helen answered, leaning over to fart loudly. She brought a hand filled with chips to her mouth and chewed nosily before grabbing an even bigger handful.

"I'm starving!"

Helen grinned at Violet's enthusiasm and soon had the table groaning under the amount of food, including several pies from those nice women at the supermarket the other day. Sitting beside her daughter, Helen soon dug in.

Three hours later....

Helen extended her right arm and rubbed Violet's stuffed belly, coaxing louder and louder belches from her daughter's bloated frame.

"That's my Violet," Helen encouraged, letting loose a series of farts and belches.

Each woman, thanks to the odd food from the supermarket, had gained twenty pounds, Helen's weight going to her butt and belly while Violet's breasts and belly had increased in size.

"This is the life," Violet said before farting.

Helen nodded.

Meanwhile....

Mirage started with the flight records.

If Mrs. Incredible's plane had crashed there had to have been a record of it somewhere. But so far she had no such luck. Sighing, the former henchwoman decided a lunch break was in order.

Mirage was currently in the same town as Mrs. Incredible, doing exactly as the Agency had suggested she do. Oddly enough the rest of the women in Helen's neighborhood had been steadily gaining weight as well. Something sinister was at work, Mirage was sure of it.

But she was still hungry so she decided to get some food from a hot dog vendor. This particular vendor was quite obese and had brunette hair.

"What'll you have?"

"One hot dog please, no toppings."

"Coming right up!"

What Mirage was handed several minutes later was a hot dog loaded with onions, relish, and plenty of mustard and ketchup.

"I asked for a plain hot dog."

"Sorry about that. It would be such a waste to throw that away, wouldn't it? If you have that one I'll give you your original order for free!"

Mirage thought about it for a moment and finally nodded, biting into the dog.

As she finished it, she didn't notice the gleam in the vendor's eyes. What she did notice, however, was how hungry she was all of a sudden.

Twenty minutes later Mirage went back to her hotel room, several hot dogs in her hands. The vendor walked towards a black van and knocked in a specific way. The door opened and the brunette smiled at her blond coworker.

PFFFFFFT!

"Oh man that was torture to hold it in that long!"

"Yes but your sacrifice paid off. Now that woman should be on her way to slobdom. And our tracks can remain hidden. Now how about we have our own lunch?"

"Of course!"

1243311111.title: Vriska Serket

12433111111.content:
{Originally written by DmageD (31) on The Slobverse}

Vriska took joy in many things, murder, mayhem, and most of all, just making her friend's lives miserable. She sat at the computer in the house they had built for themselves in the middle of empty space, and rather than working with her human counterparts to fight Jack Noir, she was busy rolling dice around in her hand and searching through the history of John, the human who she had been chatting with his entire life. She noticed one thing coming up over and over, his pure hatred for Betty Crocker. She had no idea who this witch could possibly have been that could cause such mayhem. She searched through the history of humans and found something surprising.

"It's just some 8kery?" she said in confusion, stunned to find that this accursed Betty Crocker was just some company that made cakes. Then again human food was so disgustingly sweet and sticky that who knows, maybe it had been the cause of great disgust to those who ate it. Vriska looked back at the other trolls, each at their own computer, and Vriska had long since realized she had no need for them. She had a plan to take out Jack, and it didn't require any of them. She grinned as she looked at her dice, which had the ability to manipulate her powers and even reality itself. If she rolled an 8 on all of them, then perhaps she could have some fun and expose them to the evil that was Betty Crocker before she got rid of each of them.

Vriska rolled her dice, all eight of them clinked against the floor and rolled across the metallic floor. Each of the trolls looked up and noticed that Vriska was planning something, but it was too late, the dice all slowly stopped their rolling. The first came up an 8, followed by another, then another, and another. Vriska was known as the Thief of Light, because of how she had stolen all the luck she needed to make sure that all her rolls came out how she wanted. Only four more and they came up 8.... 8..... 8......... 1? Vriska couldn't believe it, how could one of them not have come up an 8? In fact not just an 8, but a 1? She then looked up from the die and saw that her sister, the blind Seer Terezi, had stopped the die prematurely with her cane. She smiled and licked her lips, not knowing what Vriska was going for, but knowing that she had stopped it.

There was a flash of blue light and suddenly Vriska, Terezi, Feferi, Nepeta, Kanaya, and Aradia found themselves transported away from their base, and they were inside of a giant factory that smelled of creamy deserts.
12433111111.title: A bad roll of dice.

124331111112.content:
{Originally written by Yort (30) on The Slobverse}

Almost immediately, Terezi lunged at an unsuspecting Vriska, cane-blades drawn. Caught by surprise, Vriska was pinned to the floor by her sleeves. Terezi glared at her, revenge showing through her crimson glasses. She had been tolerance of Vriska's repeated injustices, but this was the last straw. The Thief had a smug grin on her face, almost daring her "sister" to kill her. But death was too good for her. The Seer had something better in Mind.

Her comrades, however, were notably less interested. Aradia had already warped away, abandoning what she believed a doomed timeline. Nepeta and Feferi, forgiving almost to the point of obliviousness, were discussing how they planned to escape the factory. Kanaya, though, had to make a decision.

Finding an exit was the main priority, but she had a lot of pent-up feelings towards Vriska, and what Terezi was planning seemed like the perfect opportunity to vent them. The four other trolls turned their heads to notice her thoughtful hesitation.

What did she choose?
124331111112.title: Make Her Pay

choices: Made them think she hates it so they feed her more.
Lunged herself face-first into the cupcakes.
1243311111121.content:
{Originally written by Yort (30) on The Slobverse}

"You Two Go On Ahead," she gestured at Nepeta and Feferi. "I'll Stay With These Two. To Keep Them Apart, Of Course." As the pair went down an enormous hallway on toward their own adventure, Kanaya turned her head to see that Terezi had already bound Vriska at her hands and feet using loose cables nearby.

"So, What Can I Do To Help?" she asked Terezi once the others were out of earshot. Terezi was surprised at Kanaya's interest, but welcomed the assistance. "GO OV3R 4ND K33P H3R MOUTH OP3N" the blind girl replied, wandering to the side with a sense of motive. Kanaya went to Vriska and complied with Terezi's orders. Vriska wanted to object, but her jaws were too restrained to speak.

Terezi was audibly sniffing the air, her keen smell having detected something of interest. "4H-H4H!" she exclaimed deviously as she arrived at a crate. Quickly, she began to pry it open as both Kanaya and Vriska watched intently. With a snap and a creak, it opened to reveal a five-foot-tall rack of baking trays, each tray holding 24 freshly baked cupcakes topped with creamy chocolate frosting. Terezi wheeled the rack over to Vriska's awaiting maw, chuckling to herself at Vriska's face as the aroma of the confections hit her nose, juxtaposing the Thief between fear and delight.

Without saying anything, Terezi picked up one of the fatty pastries and shoved it into Vriska's mouth. Vriska struggled all over her body as she was forced to chew the alien confections. Kanaya watched her face as she swallowed, getting a pleasurable satisfaction. this cupcake alone had caused Vriska's stomach to bloat significantly, but nobody noticed.

Vriska paused as she thought to herself: she loved it! The moist sponginess, the sticky sweetness... She couldn't believe this was the work of an evil woman! She needed more. She needed all of it. Without almost no hesitation, she...
1243311111121.title: Stay and help stuff Vriska

choices: Terezi finds a huge red velvet cake and goes crazy for it.
Kanaya succumbs to her unfathomable sloblust.
12433111111212.content:
{Originally written by Yort (30) on The Slobverse}

Vriska broke free of Kanaya's grip and, before either troll girl could stop her, made a dive for the shelf of cupcakes. Ravenously she scarfed down the confections, getting frosting strewn across her face as Terezi and Vriska watched dumbfounded.

"...Okay," Terezi said cautiously, "These human foods are clearly not as torturous as I predicted." She sniffed the air again, an upset frown taking place of her devious grin.

Terezi 'looked' back at Vriska. She still hadn't stopped. "Kanaya, you keep an eye on the spiderbitch, I'm going to find some of this stuff to try for myself." Still silent from shock, Kanaya focused her gaze on Vriska's oblivious feast as Terezi wandered off.

After only a few minutes, Vriska had gone through dozens of the treats and had yet to come up for air. Kanaya was powerless to stop her, and was more fascinated at the already-visible effects of the binge. Her belly had expanded much more, riding her black shirt up and straining on the button of her jeans. Her chest bulbs were even bigger than normal, rounding out to at least a DD-cup.

Vriska's rear was sticking out at Kanaya as she ate, and had grown about twice its original size, fitting super-tightly in her jeans. Every now and then, the oversized asscheeks would rip a long, raunchy fart, hitting Kanaya at point-blank range. She felt she should be disgusted by Vriska's gas, but for some reason, each whiff of the butt fumes simply made her hungrier...

The blueblood emerged, cheeks full of flavor. She turned to Kanaya and belched loudly, splattering her face with half-chewed bits of cake. Before the jade-blood could so much as flinch, Vriska fell to the floor tired and bloated. Lethargically sitting up against some crates, Vriska unbuttoned her jeans, freeing her now-sizeable gut. Vriska moaned in relief, rubbing her big gray belly with one arm and lifting her buttcheek with the other.

"PFFFFFFFFTTTTTTTT!" The tailwind from that blast was enough to dishevel Kanaya's hair. The gas was almost intoxicating.

Her eyes shifted from the remaining cupcakes to the contented Vriska...
12433111111212.title: Taking things into her own hands.

choices: What've Kanaya and Vriska been up to?
What've Feferi and Nepeta been up to?
124331111112121.content:
{Originally written by Yort (30) on The Slobverse}

Meanwhile, Terezi has found another big crate, this one isolated from any others. She opens it the same way she opened the last one, and is taken aback by the sight that greeted her nose.A large, three-layered cake covered entirely in bright red icing and dark red laces of frosting was standing before her. A small amount of drool slips out the side of her mouth, getting wiped off by her sleeve as soon as she notices.

She approached the cake cautiously, desperately trying to keep her composure as she pinched off a sample, its crimson scent taunting Terezi's sensitive nose.
Slowly, she places the piece of cake on her tongue...

The flavor surged through her body, leaving Terezi awestruck in sensual pleasure. With hardly any thought, she dove into the cake with her tongue protruding anxiously. She began shovel the cake into her eager mouth, smearing frosting around the area of her face. Between mouthfuls, she would either burp or moan in satisfaction.

The mysterious Crockercorp food already went to work on Terezi's body. Her belly bloated like beach ball, although almost surpassing the size of one. Her breasts expanded to about two or three cup sizes and was now stretching the symbol on her black shirt, accentuating the icing stains. Her hourglass figure had evolved into a big, wide booty, each cheek bigger than an Earth basketball, and with juicier thighs to match. Her black sweatpants could barely contain Terezi's newly-enlarged butt, small tears in the seams forming forming as she farted.

Terezi chuckled. She had always been fairly "loose" about her gas, often unleashing squeaky SBD's during a conversation and laughing mischievously when the other party smelled it. Now, though, her farts were far more potent and loud, and she loved it. Terezi bit her lower lip and ripped another fart, this one sounding like a motorcycle.

FFFRRTT-RRTT-RRTT-RRTT-RRRTT. The tears were stretched by the errant vibrations of her plump, gray asscheeks. Terezi sighed with relief and began to lick up the last remnants of the once-towering pastry. She rubbed her gut and gave it a squeeze, forcing out a sudden belch.

Sluggishly, she got up and half-waddled back to where she left the other two...

12512113331.title: Book 7 (age 18)

choices: Hermione eats the meal getting fatter and smellier.
Hermione tries to refuse and is forced to eat. She gets fat.
Hermione tries her own magic but it backfires and she starts to stink.
125121133311.content:
{Originally written by Past Member 'ryu19' on The Slobverse}

Hermione woke up to find herself in a classroom. Eyes widening, she looked around and noticed other students all dressed in Hogwart's robes but she couldn't recognize any of them.

What was going on?

Her last clear memory had been of falling asleep with Ron at their flat. A smell came to her nose then and she gagged a little. Each and every one of the students were hugely fat and stunk something fierce. Flatulence and belches rang out like a hallelujah choir and Hermione was about to speak when she felt a someone staring at her. Looking up, she saw Mrs. Weasley with her hands on her hips.

Ron's mother was extremely obese and had food stains all over her robes.

"Mrs. Weasley-" but Hermione was cut off by the matriarch burping in her face.

"Hermione, you need to gain some weight, you're far too thin! And as teacher of this class at our beloved Slobwart's School we're going to do our best to make you the fattest, messiest, laziest, and smelliest witches of your generation!" Taking out her wand, Mrs. Weasley swished it at Hermione.

The next thing the bookworm knew a large banquet had appeared on her table, all the foods incredibly greasy and most of them rotting.

Hermione felt her stomach rumble and she picked up a donut, biting into it and moaning at the incredible taste.

Once the donut was finished, Hermione felt her stomach rumble.

PFFFFT! The fart that wafted from her was the loudest and smelliest Hermione had ever made. Blushing fiercely, she was about to apologize when she felt her stomach pooch out, her once slender stomach now a cute little pot belly.

"Oh, isn't that precious! Your assignment is to eat all the food on your desk, understand?"
125121133311.title: She ends up in a slobby version of Hogwarts.

choices: Hermione succumbs to the growing influence of the food and agrees
Hermione tries to stop the madness!
1251211333112.content:
{Originally written by SlobisCute (35) on The Slobverse}

Mrs. Weasley still had her matronly smile, but it was now surrounded by an absolutely doughy face swallowed by a massive extra chin that hid her neck; it jiggled and shook with every word that passed her lips. Always leaning towards the plump side, she was now weighed down with colossal saddlebag hips, a noticeable belly-apron that was tucked into a house skirt that Hermione figured to be larger than her bedsheets , and upper arms that were much wider around than Hermione's waist. She was noticeably huffing and puffing; the extra weight made even standing a chore, it looked like. Aside from the weight, Hermione noticed with disgust that the normally cleanliness-obsessed Mrs. Weasely was sporting extremely large sweat stains under her armpits and where rolls of fat pinched at her clothing.

Hermione glanced down at her newly chubbified stomach. "Is this some sort of hex?! It can't be- I would have read about it somewhere! I demand an explanation for this, Mrs. Weasely!"

Hermione got a sweet smile as a reply, then a "Just eat a little bit more, sweetheart, and you'll be so hooked you won't care about the particulars! Give your overworked brain a chance to relax for once!"

Hermione saw with horror that Mrs. Weasley wasn't trying to be manipulative; she honestly believed that Hermione needed to be fattened up and that being piggish was good! Hermione reached for her wand, but found that it was missing. Mrs. Weasely scowled and put her hands on her meaty hips. Hermione saw her hands sink in to them several inches.

"Now dear if you aren't going to be a good girl I'm going to have to make you!" She held out her wand and announced in a clear voice, "Accio Books!" Hermione saw some of her favorite textbooks fly in from another room in the school. Hermione wondered if they took her belongings and brought them into a room at this new school when they abducted her.

Mrs. Weasely brought her wand to a history textbook and tapped it. The book's shape quivered, then melted completely, reforming into a plate of hot dogs. "Each and every one of your books will get turned into something useful if you don't stop being so silly, young lady!"

Hermione's jaw dropped- her books! There were few things she loved more in the world. Hermione collected herself when Mrs. Weasely turned one of her favorite books of spells into a gigantic ham. As the mammoth woman extended a hand towards another beautiful, leather-bound tome, Hermione shouted out.
"STOP!" Without giving herself time to take back her decision, Hermione reached down and grabbed a greasy chicken wing from the table in front of her, and tore into it, cringing at how oily it was. Hermione let out a belch, and grabbed a bowl of pudding next, praying that she would be told to stop before she had to eat it all.


However, Hermione noticed that she was barely getting full; in fact, the more she ate, the more she wanted. She stopped trying to hold in her gassiness, since it was only an equally gassy, nearly 600 pound woman watching her feast. She felt her body softening, but tried not to think about it.

Then Mrs. Weasely said something that made her stop in her tracks.

"Once you finish up, be a dear and go get Ginny from Hogwarts? Just convince her to eat some of our food; my poor little girl is out there, rail thin and gas free! She trusts you, so by the time she notices something's wrong she'll be nice and addicted!"
1251211333112.title: Hermione tries to refuse and is forced to eat. ...

choices: Suddenly Lavender appears with a skinny Ginny Weasley behind her.
12512113331122.content:
{Originally written by Past Member 'ryu19' on The Slobverse}

Hermione cringed as she watched another book being turned into a massive fudge sundae. Hermione Granger was larger after eating her previous meals, her ass tearing her robes and her face now sporting a double chin.

It wasn't that much of an increase, about ten pounds or so but with her sweat adding a noxious smell to the mix Hermione felt like she had gained even more. Steeling herself, she looked at Mrs. Weasley and shook her head.

"I refuse to lead Ginny to this fate." The words would have had more impact but Hermione farted right after that and blushed once more.

Mrs. Weasley's face turned red, whether from exertion or anger Hermione couldn't tell. More and more books were soon transformed into lobsters, hamburgers, and pizza. Mrs. Weasley then lifted a large dollop of ice cream towards Hermione's mouth.

"Open wide Hermione, do it for mommy..."

Hermione kept her mouth shut as long as she could until gas roiled around in her stomach and she belched, the witch using that opportunity to shove a spoonful into her mouth.

"We have all the time in the world to wait for you to come around to us dear," Mrs. Weasley said, smiling as Hermione rubbed her belly which had gained a few more pounds and now poking out from her shirt.

How long could Hermione last?
12512113331122.title: Hermione tries to stop the madness!

choices: Hermione uses wandless magic to appear normal to trick Ginny into going with her
Hermione stays slobby and forces Ginny to come.
125121133311222.content:
{Originally written by Past Member 'ryu19' on The Slobverse}

All of Hermione's self-control, all of her willpower, all of her essence only gave her one hour. After that hour Hermione's pudgy stomach rumbled and she started scarfing down the sundae and any other food before her, a glazed look in her eye matched only by the glazed ham she picked up several minutes later, stuffing it in her mouth.

Mrs. Weasley beamed as she watched the honey drip all over Hermione's chin, which was now truly a double.

"Mrsh Weasley..." Hermione started to say through the mass of food slithering down her thoat.

"Yes?"

"I'll...I'll go get Ginny. I want her to, to URP, experience this great joy!"

"Great!" The Weasley matriarch farted loudly then only to be cut off by Hermione closing her eyes and releasing the largest fart either woman had ever heard. "Hermione!"

The witch only giggled and went back to eating.

An hour later, fifty pounds heavier and now approaching two hundred and fifty pounds, Hermione got up from her chair.

Mrs. Weasley led her towards a closet near the back of the class, opening the door and pushing her in.

The Porthole, for that is what it was, deposited Hermione in Ginny's bedroom.

Ginny was asleep.
125121133311222.title: Hermione breaks.

choices: The girls look around for people they know!
The girls eat some more of Mrs. Weasely's cooking!
1251211333112221.content:
{Originally written by SlobisCute (35) on The Slobverse}

Hermione immediately realized by feeling down her side that she looked as thin as always. Hermione guessed that Miss Weasely knew that Ginny wouldn't come on her own, and made sure the appropriate transfiguration charm was cast to make her look unassuming. She knew that her true body was that of a flabby, somewhat smelly witch though, as she was dying for some of Mrs. Weasely's cooking and was fighting the urge not to pass gas. {Note: spoilers for the seventh and final season of the show.}

No one knows for sure what happened, but sometime after the creation of the United Reams, a strange new curse struck that slowly made the whole town of StoryBrooke into obese slobs. No one found this to be a truly horrifying change, so no efforts were being made to undo it. If anything, it made Granny rich beyond her wildest dreams and able to retire into the rather large lap of luxury. But our tale concerns yet another "Granny" from Storybrooke, one whose Savior magic had enabled her to go without a single gray hair despite the fact that she now had an adult son with a daughter of his own.

Emma Swan was now well over three hundred pounds and yet was still able to squeeze into her trademark red leather jacket. A slight grin crossed her face as she noted how her footsteps could still cause slight tremors in the town's sidewalk despite the various magical reinforcements that had been put into place. Yet another reason why she had been dubbed Storybrooke's number one slob. There was not a single person in town that could out-eat, out-belch, or outdo the Savior Sheriff in any aspect of her new lifestyle and she loved it far more than having to deal with fairy tale villains and whatever new variation of the ever repetitive Dark Curse they used at least once every few months . Even her own family submitted to her when it came to various slob competitions...except one. Henry's daughter Lucy was affected by the new curse more slowly than Storybrooke's other many thousands of inhabitants. Her weight gain and loss of concern for manners and hygene was a slow and gradual process from the start. On any other given day, the town's heroes might have looked to this as a key clue in unraveling the nature of the curious transformation, but as previously stated, no one felt the need to concern themselves with such things this time around. Emma was actually equally parts concerned and amused by her granddaughter's rather prominent competitive streak. The kid was already much fatter than most of the other children in town and seemed almost over eager to catch up to her parents and the other adults. The Savor was almost certain that Lucy would turn their lunch date at Granny's, Emma's current destination, into some kind of challenge. Not that Emma minded very much. It might even be a fun way to bond with the grandaughter she still just barely knew. So, she thought with a smirk, bring it on.

He would have thought this would call for cheers, but corporate was allowing these parties about once a week to keep the staff happy and from leaving to a competitor, who usually offered free lunch every day. "So party planning committee, I want to see those wide rears in the conference room ASAP." He said with his typical smile before turning around and heading into his office.

Platters of donuts lay on the table of the conference room, and none of the women were shy about helping themselves before things even got started.

The girls chatted about the plan for the afternoon, but it wasn't long before they could hear the door opening and Michael sauntered in. "How are my party planning bitches doing?!" He said jokingly.

Gasping from the short walk to her desk, Pam slowly planted her impressive backside on her overworked desk chair, provoking a surprisingly loud creaking sound from the flimsy furniture.

Ignoring the chair's pleading as always, Pam was instantly met by the usual box of donuts that some office worker had made sure always was on her desk.

She finished all the donuts she had at her desk and realized she was still hungry. Pam remembered that she had tons of food in the break room for her.

"Hey, Jim wanna get food with me in the break room?" Pam asked

"I would love to." Jim said

"Ok, but you will have to help me up first." Pam told him

Jim attempted to pry the massive worker from her seat. It was no easy task lifting a woman of Pam’s great size, even if the two were only a few pounds apart. Their great guts squished and slapped against each other. Jim’s grasp on Pam soon devolved into a bulky bear-hug, forcing their breasts (Pam’s boobs and Jim’s moobs) into a mushy mound of four massive mammaries.

"Ugh, Jim!" Pam whined, "That hurts!"

"Jus’…Jus gimme…"

Jim could feel Pam’s weight rising from her chair, which only made it seem harder in the long run. Ultimately though, he would have to give up. His friend was much too fat and he was far too out of shape to help anyone out in anything physical. Ever.

However he didn’t simply just give up. By the time his grasp gave way, Jim was already mid-tug on Pam’s supple shape. Then out of nowhere Pam pops out of her seat.

They get into the break room and Pam puts a ton of food on the table and the two dig in.

The table was covered with dessert food. 2 large, double-layered chocolate cakes, 3 cheesecakes (one oreo, one strawberry, and one plain), 4 gallons of ice cream of assorted flavors, 4 assorted pies, and a rootbeer float for both of them. There was also 6 2-liter bottles of soda for them to wash it all down with.

Pam shoved the food into her mouth with one hand while rubbing her tender, quivering belly with the other hand.

"URRRRRPPPP" she belched after sucking down half a bottle of soda. She had soda dripping down the side of her mouth, and some ice cream had found its way to the side of her cheek.

Jim squealed as he inhaled the contents of his plate. Between burps he tried to speak to the tastes he was experiencing, "mm..so bubbly URP I can't wait to try more HIC soda..." This continued on as he reached his arms out, raking more food towards his mouth as his ballooning stomach thundered forward. He didn't seem to notice that his dress shirt had ridden up over his belly button and trickles of chocolate sauce had dripped down onto his belly from his multiple chins.

"So Pam URP can you share HIC more of the food URP?" asked Jim

Pam patted her bellowing belly and was going to answer, but all that came out was, "BBBUUUUURRRRRRPPPPPPPP".

(Fast-forward 2 hours)

The table was destroyed, about 6 giant platters that had been previously full of food were now empty, leaving behind only garnishes, discarded napkins, and utensils. Jim had just finished eating, his chipmunk cheeks were covered in confectionery sugar, and his fingers were brown with melted chocolate.

Pam's massive gut was fully exposed. Her hands were placed atop the shelf of a stomach in front of her. Her massive thighs were covered in discarded napkins and crumbs.

As she leaned back and patted her belly, the chair finally gave, and Pam fell to the ground, her leg kick the table, send food flying. Her immense belly was flattened and oozed all around her like an ocean wobbling and jiggling along with her overflowing cleavage.

Before either of them could react the plates of food that fell on the floor it seemed to be the last straw for the chair Jim sat on, and he also when down in a heap of wobbling blubbery mass.

Fortunately, Jim’s blubbery backside cushioned his fall.

"Michael we need some help!" Pam yelled and Michael waddled as fast as he could.

Pam was wiggling like crazy trying to get herself to at least a sitting position. Jim was already sitting up, and Dwight came in pretty quick for his size and was trying to help Jim stand by pushing against his friend's titanic ass. "Come on push!" Jim exclaimed.

"I am! I am!" Dwight exclaimed as his hands sank into the wall of blubber that is Jim’s ass.

Meanwhile, Michael was trying to get Pam up but failed to do so.

"Dwight I need your help" Michael told Dwight

They grabbed Pam’s chubby hands and tried to pull, they were turning red with effort, but was unable to hoist her up. Michael tried to help by pushing against his friend's titanic ass. He pushed with all his might against the wall of blubber. However, Michael was too much out of shape to add enough.

"Sorry Pam, we need help."

"No problem. Michael can you just fetch me the rest of that cheesecake-I'm starving!" as her belly let out a loud grumble.

"No, I need her to help me with Jim." Dwight waddled over to Jim and tried to pull him up with Michael trying to push on his swollen posterior. With both helping they were able to get him on to his feet. Jim’s monumental gut fell down with a juggle.

Finally it was time to help the most bloated of the overweight workers.

Dwight and Michael grabbed on Pam’s hands while Jim pushed her monumental backside. Pam’s chin was pressed against her sea of cleavage which was overflowing out of her top. Jim’s hands were sinking very far into her blubber as he tried to help up his great butterball of a friend up.

Jim claimed "Okay, everyone 1. 2. 3." And one more push Pam as upright.

As they leave the break room Pam spots a poster Angela put up for the party. She walks over and read the poster and it says:

Food Party
Where: Conference Room
When: Right after work today
Dress Code: All clothing is provided because it will be messy. Men: Tank Top and Shorts Women: Crop Top and Short Shorts


Pam was so excited that she went back to her desk and pretended to do work for the rest of the day.

Youâre time in the limelight is over Cameron. Weâre looking for a new talent to carry our franchise and give professional voice actors a chance to shine.â

âLook, Diaz, just because youâre salty that you havenât had a major film job since the last movie, that doesnât mean you can take that out on us.â The person replied, coolly. âBesides, the only way we would even consider casting you in the part again is if the new girl is somehow unable to perform, and that doesnât seem very likely.â And with that, they hung up the phone.

Cameron just stood in her living room, processing the torrent of emotions whirling around in her head. Betrayal at having her role taken away from her. Envy toward the woman who received it. Disappointment for losing out on a potential source for money.

But above all else: Rage for how powerless she was to change this.

And the best way she sought to convey that anger was to throw her phone at the nearest wall, leaving a thin gash in the structure. âSo, some young punk wants to take my job. Iâll see about that!â

--

Following a long, stressful car ride, Cameron arrived at the residence of the actress who had âpilferedâ her role. Pulling up in the driveway, she exited her vehicle and stomped to the front door, banging on the wooden structure, sporting a gray shirt, black pants, and white shoes. After a couple seconds, the sound of footsteps on the other side could be heard, growing louder until the turning of locks replaced it, and thus the door opened outward to reveal Cameronâs competition.

Towering at six feet tall, the strangerâs oily bronze skin glistened in the Sun. Her thighs were thick enough to touch each other and stretched her black sweatpants to its very limits, Cameron even spotting some small tears on the front. A dome-shaped belly jutted out in front of her, poking out underneath her sweat-soaked beige t-shirt. Resting atop her rotund tummy was a pair of perky C-Cup breasts, the milky cannons nipples pressing against her shirt. Paradoxically, her arms and legs were rather toned, albeit covered with a layer of adipose, giving her a slightly intimidating appearance. The woman yawned and brushed away some disheveled, dirt-colored hair from her eyes. She looked as though she just got out of bed.

At 3:00 in the afternoon.

âYo,â The brunette greeted with a cavalier wave, her smile flashing yellow-tinted teeth. âWhat do you want?â

It took a moment for Cameron to regain her composure upon viewing her rival for the first time. She got a whiff of the brunetteâs breath and winced. Between the stench of digested onion chili dogs and the piss-colored chompers, Cameron concluded that this woman had a severe case of halitosis, or at least went a few days without brushing her teeth. However, she reminded herself about what she was doing for and got back on track. âIâm here because you stole my role away, and I want it back.â

The actress stayed mute for a couple seconds, appearing to be deep in thought, before she snapped her fingers in revelation. âWait a minute, youâre Cameron Diaz! You probably heard about me landing the part of Princess Fiona in the new Shrek film. Nameâs Carla Waters, by the way.â

âWell, Carla, you should know that since Iâve been playing the character for so long, I would make a much better choice to voice her now,â Cameron explained. âThe movie execs think that Iâm old news, but Iâm going to prove Iâve still got what it takes.â

Carla put a crumb-covered finger onto her soft double chin, musing over her choices. On one hand, she earned her position fair-and-square, so she really didnât need to entertain Cameronâs vendetta. On the other hand, being able to show up the predecessor to her current role would do wonders for her confidence in performing the part, not to mention the good publicity she could score herself and the film for winning. âAlright, letâs have a little competition. First, a gas contest, then a slug eating contest, and finally a martial arts contest. Best two-out-of-three wins.â

Cameron blinked in confusion at the mention of that second contest, but nonetheless nodded in agreement. Carlaâs mud-hued pupils lit up and she led her inside the house. Cameron got a good look at her backside, Carlaâs glutes sticking out as far as her breasts, even with some cellulite being visible through the fabric. Upon entering, Cameron recoiled in disgust as her nostrils were assaulted by a miasma of fetid odors, unknown to her host. Her eyes meeting piles of sweaty clothes littering the staircase to her right. There was no sign of a basket nearby, though. As Cameron continued into the kitchen, her shoes treading over hair-blanketed carpets and floors, the assault of smells grew in intensity. Surveying the new environment, she discovered several sources of the stenches, such as a sink overflowing with unwashed dishes and silverware, and a garbage can filled to the brim with trash. When Carla opened the back door, Cameron couldnât leave the cruel cooking room quickly enough.

Compared to the interior, Carlaâs backyard was far less toxic to the nose. On her left was a picnic table, conspicuously topped with platters and lids. To her right was a swimming pool, although rather than water, it was filled with mud. Her curiosity reached a boiling point and she turned to Carla.

âWhy is your house a shithole?â

Carla faced Cameron, showing no signs of being offended. âOh, Iâve been living like an ogre for the past few days to try and get into the role. Iâm eating gross food, letting gas out when I feel like, playing in the mud, etcetera,â Carla stated plainly. âNow letâs get this show on the road, starting with the gas contest.â

Cameron scoffed internally, thinking that a gas contest would be childâs play. While her flatulence wasnât too well talked about, her belches were a thing of beauty. She has proven that she can burp on command on the Jay Leno show, had one of her accidental Coca-Cola burps added into the first Shrek, and even won the first inaugural Nickelodeon Kids' Choice Awards celebrity burping contest for the Best Burp Award. 125333331111132.title: Cameron's Crass Crusade

1253333311111321.content:
Carla proceeded to puff up her checks and let out a thunderous belch. “*OOOORRRRRRRP!*” The blast of gas carried a consistent bassy pitch as it roared to life. For the next two seconds, the louder-than-average burp boomed into the air, a smell of digesting roast beef augmenting her already rancid breath. When it ended, Carla smiled at Cameron. “You’re up!”

Cameron glared back at her. “You call that a belch? This is a belch!” She taunted, thumping a fist to her chest, and let out a thunderous burp of her own. “*BAAAAAAAArrrrrrrrp!!*” Three seconds was how long it took for Cameron’s eructation to run its course, starting with an abysmal pitch that ascended to a heavenly one halfway through. Her belch rang out louder than Carla’s, however it’s scent was severely lacking, considering Cameron had skipped breakfast and actually bothered to brush her teeth today. Nonetheless, she was satisfied with her gaseous outburst when it ceased, sneering at her rival afterward.

Carla quickly swallowed a deep breath of air, her face adopting a look of intense concentration. She bobbed her head back into her neck for a second before bopping it forward emitting another gargantuan burp. “*HYYYYYYYUUUUUUURRRRRRRRP!!!*” Once again, the pitch of Carla’s eructation was a monotonous baritone, sounding more akin to a growling lion than a young woman. An aroma of chicken joined her previous beefy fumes to form an even more putrid fog. Cameron found herself flinching at how loud Clara’s belch was, four seconds being the time needed for it to fade out of existence. “That felt good!” She said, patting her belly in relief.

Cameron stared at Carla in shock, bewildered by her nonchalant attitude toward her burp. Then, she gripped her stomach with both of her hands and began gulping down a large amount of air, every inhale causing her belly to expand in her hands. When she felt her stomach reaching its maximum capacity, Cameron pushing down hard atop her stomach, letting rip another monstrous burp. “*baaaaaahhhhhh-UUURRRRRRRRRRP!!!*” Cameron’s second belch had an opposite pitch to her first, beginning at a soaring soprano and then dropping to a contralto near the back half. In terms of stench, it was a little better than before, drumming up some broccoli dinner from the previous night, but not much else. It matched the loudness of Carla’s last burp, though barely eclipsing Carla’s eructation from a length perspective at four and a half seconds long. As it concluded, Cameron smirked at Carla, thinking that her burp was insurmountable. “Beat that!”

Carla giggled innocently, causing Cameron to arc an eyebrow in confusion. The brunette then clutched her knees and leaned down, bopping her head back as she began swallowing down as much air into her stomach as she could. After a few moments, Carla reeled her head forward, pressed her hands into her stomach, and pushed out a truly wondrous belch. “*BWWWWWWUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRROOOOOOAAAAAAAAAAAAAP!!!!!*{/ i}”

It reeked of day-old meat lovers pizza, amalgamating with her prior aromas to form a trifecta of foul fragrance that forced Cameron to fan the fumes away. Blaring for a total of eight seconds, the immense eructation erupted with enough power to ripple her lips. It rang with sufficient volume to be heard by the surrounding households over their lawnmowers and held a gravelly pitch for its duration. After it ended, Carla thumped her chest to force out any leftover pockets of air.

Meanwhile, Cameron growled, knowing that she couldn’t exceed Carla’s closing belch. Her failure in what she considered her area of expertise sparking a competitive fire that she wanted to fan into the next events. Rather than actually voice her defeat however, Cam opted to move on to the second half of the contest. “Let’s see how the other end works.” Cameron declared before letting out a fart. *FRRRRT!!* Unlike her burps, Cameron’s opening fart maintain a constant bassy pitch, rocketing out of her ass at a volume that matched her first belch. It only lasted one second, and displayed a faint scent of red beans. Cameron sneered at Carla as it ended.

Carla just smiled at Cameron in response before hiking up a leg and letting out a fart of her own. *PHhhhhHFFffffFT!!* Carla’s bout of flatulence had a pitch like a roller coaster, commencing at a low altitude before rising up to a plateau, then plummeting into a valley and boomeranging back onto the peak, before finally descending to ground level. Her air biscuit equaled Cameron’s in the loudness department, though it pissed all over Cam’s fart with a stench of digested cabbage-and-garlic burritos. When the gurgly ass-ripper concluded after two and a half seconds, Carla wafted the wretched odor over toward her opponent.

Cameron took a whiff and her cheeks turned a shade of green after being exposed to the tainted air. Carla laughed childishly at the display, to which Cameron responded by gritting her teeth, squatting down and squeezing. *PBBBBBBBLLLLLLRRRRRRT!* Once again, Cameron’s butt bomb boomed with an entirely cavernous pitch, though it was quieter than her last fart. The booty-quaking blast lasted for three and a half seconds before stopping, leaving behind an aroma of fermented cheese to blend with her other fart’s breeze. When it finished, Cameron locked eyes with Carla, breathing slightly more heavily after her flatulence.

Carla took a deep breath and relaxed her anus, letting out another fart. *SSSssccchhHHHLLllrrrp!!!!* Her backwind bellowed forth from her rectum with the pitch of a brass instrument, which then soared to a higher melody before crashing into a chasm, and lastly ascending to a heavenly whistle. Cameron then closed her eyes, clenched her teeth and ripped another fart. *ppppphhhhhhhhsssss...* With a pitch like a steaming tea kettle, Cameron’s third fart slid out of her ass with little noise to indicate its presence. However, the cloud of ass gas did eventually make its way to Carla’s nostrils, and the smell actually made her wave the haze away.

“While that did have a pungent sting,” Carla lectured. “Silent but deadly is no way to win a farting contest.”
