14333212221.content:
{Originally written by Past Member 'ryu19' on The Slobverse}

Artemis and Megan looked at one another and then back to the well lit room a deep but still female voice had come from.

They were still in the Watchtower, right?

"Enter, for we have much to tell you," the voice continued.

Both heroes finally did enter and couldn't keep the gasps from escaping their mouths.

Their was Wonder Woman and The Black Canary, two of the fittest, strongest, and most inspirational heroines in the world but fit was something one could no longer apply to them.

Or inspirational.

Both were fat, incredibly fat, fatter than any man, woman, or creature both had seen in their lives.

Wonder Woman had gained largely in her rear and, as she spoke, they could see the jiggle of six of her new chins.

"It was a curse from URRRRRRRRRRRRRAAAAAAAAAP Circe," Wonder Woman said, the origin of the voice that had called them inside.

"Yeah and then we got hungry and we PRRRRRFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFT think it's going to effect every single female hero on the planet," Black Canary replied, her stomach only slightly larger than Wonder Woman's but her fart twice as potent as the Amazon's belch had been.

"We think you two might be the next to feel the effects," Wonder Woman said, while munching on a large glazed ham.

14411122.content:
Ever since her beautiful, ebony hair was shaved off on Total Drama Island, Heather had gone through extensive measures to get it back. She's tried wigs, implants, hair tonic, etc. None of them have come close to recreating her luscious locks. All that changed when she got a postcard from the one bimbo she hated the most. Her former teammate and stooge, Lindsay.

Somehow she managed to actually win a season of Total Drama even though she had as much tact, intelligence, and memory as a goldfish. Heather suspected the bitch cheated and slept with the producers but then realized that Lindsay wouldn't be smart enough to think of that. More likely than not the big boobed blonde got lucky and outlasted everyone else. For the last two weeks she made the headlines of all the tabloids going to parties and flaunting her wealth with Beth. Heather envied her and would have mauled her if she had the chance.

She did get her chance when she got a postcard stained with grease from Lindsay. The reality star had disappeared off the face of the world after she posted online about going on some special vacation and no one has heard anything from her in two weeks. Heather hoped she died in a plane crash or choked on one of those plastic six pack rings but that wasn't the case. She wrote about how well she was doing and how she wanted to patch things up between them. Heather almost balled up the postcard right then and there until she read that this country Lindsay was at, Slo-bata or whatever, had some new hair growth techniques. The postcard even had some plus sized women gorgeous hair hanging down to their feet. Lindsay was offering to pay for the treatment and plane tickets so Heather figured she might as well take advantage of this. She'd get her hair back, schmooze up to Lindsay, and mooch off of her millions.

What Lindsay forgot to mention was that Slobata was absolutely disgusting.

Granted, it was a beautiful, tropical paradise with dozens of shops, beautiful jungles, and a dazzling beach perfect for getting some sun. The problem was with the people. Every single person here was morbidly obese, wore loose fitting clothing that showed off too much ass and belly, and smelled like an outhouse. It was like Owen set up a family reunion here and he was the smallest one. If Lindsay couldn't get Heather her hair back, she was going to throttle her.

Heather hopped into the first cab she found, which was remarkably spacious, and rode off. The driver was gargantuan and had his gut pressed into the bottom of the steering wheel. The cab floor was littered with wrappers, take out bags, and soda cups, some of them leaking a sickly sludge. Heather hiked her legs up and gave the driver a paper with some directions sent by Lindsay. It should have been a ten minute drive straight to Lindsay's hotel, but after thirty minutes, Heather realized that relying on Lindsay was dumber than trusting Chris to properly test a challenge.

The driver wasn't much help either since he stopped at every fourth drive thru to order enough food to make Owen nauseous. Even worse, he had an even worse case of gas and refused to lower the windows unless he was making an order. Heather tried to speak up but the gas was so thick she could taste the beans he digested. She kept her mouth shut and waited hoping that this would end soon. Instead it just seemed to go on and on and on. To the point where she was getting hungry.

Heather wasn't sure how much more of this she could take. The directions were underneath one of the drivers' take out bags easy to reach. If she wanted she could make a break for it and walk the rest of the way. There's no way the cab driver could catch up with her if she bolted.
But she was also a stranger in this bizarre land. She could end up even more lost than before. The cab driver ripped another sloppy fart and Heather gagged on the stench. She had to make a choice.

If she had to guess the ditzy blonde likely got tricked into coming here with no clue what the locals were like. Or maybe she did knew and wanted to feel good about being the skinniest bitch here. Instead, she was sprayed in the face with ranch dressing. It spewed with the intensity of a high pressure firehose and drenched her entire face. She took her hand off the button and stopped before she swallowed another mouthful of the white sludge. Heather gagged and coughed, blowing globs of dressing out of her nose. She didn't notice a heavyset guy approach her from behind.

"You must be new around here," said a stranger with a strangely smooth voice. "It's hard to work this right the first time. I can help you out."

Before Heather could respond, his belly pushed into her back and he grabbed the back of her head. Before she could fight back, he pressed the button on the fountain and she got hit again with a strong stream. Heather tried to tell him to stop but once she opened her mouth the dressing filled her maw and she had no choice but to gulp it down. The former castmate resisted but his grip was too strong and he was too heavy to shove off. He moved her head so she couldn't face away and the surge was too strong to close her mouth off from. Her stomach swelled like a water balloon and started rounding out.

Heather finally put her foot down, quite literally, and stomped on the guy's foot with her heel. He cried out and let go of the button and Heather. She took the opportunity to book it after that ignoring the shouts of her irritated feeder. Once she made it to the parking lot, she wiped the ranch from her eyes and paused to catch her breath. A gas bubble from up her esophagus and surfaced with a tangy belch that Heather despised. The small belly bump poking out of her waist angered her further but not as much as the damp sensation of being soaked in ranch dressing. Even worse, she left her suitcase behind in the cab and didn't have a change of clothes.

Just when she was about to give in to despair, she noticed a clothing store off in the distance. It was a chain she recognized but appeared to be part of a larger mall. Her initial plan was to go shopping once she regained Lindsay's trust but she refused to spend another hour in these sloppy clothes. Ignoring the odd and hungry looks she got, Heather stomped over to the store.

The interior of the store was surprisingly well kept and pristine, although the smell remained awful and everyone in her was still fat. Heather ignored them and made a beeline to the women's section, but not before grabbing some towels off of a display and drying herself off. Once that was taken care of, she had to search the entire store for clothes in her size. Which was harder than she expected given the smallest size she could find was XXXL. Heather was about to call it quits when suddenly...

144313323.content:
On a typical morning in the Equestrian town of Ponyville, the numerous array of Apple bearing trees of Sweet Apple Acres would be lush and verdant with full red fruit and thick green leaves. However, today was not a typical morning. The land of horses was still very much deep into the harsh winter, the ground once blanketed in grass now in snow, the trees the standing dead.

Applejack, Equestria’s element of Honesty and Sweet Apple Orchard’s Head farmhand, looked down at the slopes dirt path with a concerned frown. The orange coated Earth pony wore her significant red-black plaid jacket to protect herself from the biting frost, her Stetson hat only covering her blonde hair. She had a love and hate relationship with the sight of the dead trees in her orchard; on one hand, she was enjoying the time off from the Apple bucking season, but on the other bend it was sad to see all her hard work die off.

But Applejsck was certainly getting herself comfortable in the last frill of the winter months, that much could be seen by her figure. The Orange Earth Pony had always been a big eater, and naturally on the chubby side, but all her work bucking trees kept her flab in check. With no apples to buck, the lively mare gained a firm and round paunch in her midsection, as well as her impressive backside. Years of bucking apples off trees built up the muscles in her legs, developing an impressive pear shape that made heads than whenever she went. A true hell of the south, if Ponyville was in the south.

“Mighty sad t’see the ol’ place this way,” she muttered to herself, a slight frown on her rounded face, “Ah know it’ll come back in spring, but still pretty hard t’watch.”


The ample bottomed earth Pony walked back to the main barnyard, her boots crushing the snow underneath and her soft booty jiggling up and down, left and right in her gait. A cold breeze crept through the dead forest of Apple trees, making Applejack shiver on the cold and her blubber to ripple.

“Brrr, colder than a penguin’s pyjamas today,” she shuddered, using one of her many colourful colloquialisms, “hope the barn’s a lil’ warm at least.”

Applejack came into the family home’s front yard and saw her big brother, Big Macintosh coming out from the barn, prompting a grin to form on her freckled, chubby cheeks. The huge muscular pony chewed a piece of wheat between his teeth, adjusting his blue flannel shirt beneath his trademark horse collar.

“Howdy Big Mac,” Applejack greeted, looking up to face her older brother, “checkin’ out the supplies?”

“Eeyup,” Big Mac nodded, as laconic as ever.

“How’re they all lookin’?” she enquired, a hopeful grin on her face, “still mighty nice Ah reckon!”

Big Mac slowly shook his head. “Nope.”

“‘Nope’?” Applejack cocked an eyebrow, grin falling into a frown, “What’s wrong with ‘em?” She trotted up to the barn door, surprisingly easy with her muscles carrying all that flab, and pushed it open with a hoof.

The Apple Fanily are quite thoughtful and well prepared when it comes to their trade, their ansestral Business passed on from generation to generation; with the lowering demand of apples over winter, they decided to keep their last bountiful harvest and stockpile it in the barn until after the Winter Wrap-Up. The only problem was, since it was getting colder and the trees were close to ending for winter, the apples weren’t exactly as healthy as usual, but still quite healthy.

Applejack turned on the light inside the barn, revealing bushels filled with small mountains of apples of all colours and types, as well as buckets of packaged apple desserts like pies and fritters, and barrels of apple cider. Her green eyes widened at the collection, feeling her large appetite wake up.

“‘Bout to go bad,” Big Mac suddenly spoke up, snapping her out of her little trance, “Reckon we got a good few days on ‘em.”

That worried the young mare. She’d never had a single apple go bad before. “Can’t we make ‘em into fritters or somethin’? Get some use outta ‘em while we can?”

“Nope,” the large stallion shook his head again, “Too many of ‘em. Gonna wait fer Granny Smith to think of somethin’.”

Applejack frowned, not liking the idea. These apples only had a few days left, and there were so many of them! But nonetheless, she nodded, deciding her grandmother and matriarch of Sweet Apple Acres would have the best idea for what to do despite her eccentricity. “Alrighty then.”

The two left the barn and headed for the warmth of the farmhouse, Applejack taking one last longing glance at the abundance of apples before closing the barn door.

14511.content:
Somewhere deep in the slobverse, a brick wall is split open by a glowing green portal. Rick and Morty both step out, rick leading his timid grandson.

“R-Rick… where are we? … God damn it is this butt world again!?”
“No no Morty” Rick grabs Mortys shoulder “It's… it’s the slobverse Morty. It's an entire dimension that just makes you super fat. These are the perfect conditions to harvest fat concentrate morty! It's one of the ingredients I need for antimatter fuel... or whatever.”
“Gee Rick, that doesn’t make much sense… I I I mean, how does human fat make-”
“You know what Morty! If you're so smart… wh-why don’t you tell ME what to do? Huh?”

Without giving Morty a chance to retort, Rick brings him out of the alleyway to a street lined with greasy fast food joints. In the sky, towering above even the tallest skyscrapers, can be found massive balls of human fat that make up the oldest residents of the slobverse. Everything is covered in a thin layer of grease and excrement.

“O-oh jeez… I’m not feeling too good about this one, Rick… Do we really have to-to walk around here?”
“Well Morty… if you really don't want to… I know someone who we can send in instead.”
“Whos that?”
“That Jessica girl… She's perfect for this! We can send her in, come back in a week, and harvest the fat concentrate right here Morty! After all we have to do is wipe her memory and remove all the fat!”
“R-rick! Tha-tha-thats a-”
“Mortyyy! Shut up! I've studied you're little 'love interest' for a verrry long time, and shes perfect for reasons you can't comprehend! That's the plot and you're gonna deal with it, OK?! Now let's go get Jessica.”


How long does Rick leave Jessica in the slobverse?

choices: Diana devours the Burger, and is horrified when her body changes.
Diana devours the burger, and finds both her mind and body changes.
Diana fails to finish the burger, but learns about the new world.
1511.content:
A few hours ago, Wonder Woman had been fighting her nemesis, Circe, in Gateway city. The sorceress cast a spell and Diana suddenly found herself in a strange, rundown version of her current home where every other building was a fast food place! The effects of this showed on the population as every man, woman, and child was morbidly obese. They also dressed in wrinkled and messy clothes that were covered in food stains. She walked through the streets trying to spot something familiar, but whatever she did see was distorted in some way.

People seemed to recognize her and were glad for her presence, but looked at the Amazon somewhat oddly. She thought she heard a few people muttering about her losing weight as they passed her by. She continued to walk until she heard her own stomach growl rather loudly. Had it really been that long since she'd eaten?

With a shrug, she decided to enter the nearest burger joint. The smell of grease and body odor wafted through the air, nearly making her gag. The customers around her were quite gassy and added to the unpleasant odors every few minutes. One couple, a teenage boy and girl who were covered in acne, were having a belching contest when the boy suddenly farted. Rather than be disgusted, the girl farted right back and started a new contest. Diana shook her head at the sight, unsure whether to be disgusted or amused. A particularly disgusting belch suddenly caught her attention and her jaw dropped when she saw the offender.

"Cassie!?" It was indeed Cassie Sandsmark, demi-goddess daughter of Zeus and bearer of the title of "Wonder Girl." She was as obese as anyone and was clearly struggling to fit into her uniform. The biggest, messiest burger that Diana had ever seen was clutched in her hands. The teenage super heroine turned at the mention of her name and let out a gasp of her own. "Diana!? What happened to you!? You look so...thin and you smell like you've had a shower!"

"It was Circe," Diana explained, deciding to ignore the clear disgust in her young protege's voice. "She cast a spell and-now-!"

"That explains it." Cassie interrupted in a relieved sounding voice. "Come on, let's get you fattened back up and kick her ass!" Before Diana could object, she was hoarded into the booth and served a burger even more massive than the one Cassie was eating. It was disgusting looking, but her stomach still roared at the sight of it. What could she do?
1511.title: Wonder Woman in the Slobverse Part 1

info.brief_description: I'm remaking an lost interactive. Females become gross slobs.
info.description:
I'm remaking an lost interactive called 'The Slobverse'. Credit goes to rarrawer   on Eka's Portal   for archiving the original interactive on Mediafire  .

In this story females from various media find themselves in a strange world where everyone and everything is a slob.

GROUND RULES:
What is allowed
Males, Females, Hermaphrodites, Androgynous peoples, Gender Non binaries, etcetera can ALL be tortured.
Vore of any kind
Female Weight Gain
ANYTHING with belching
Sex
Immobility
Exploding
Blood and Gore
Nudity of any kind
Pooping/Scat
Futa
Breast Expansion
Killing the main character
Writing in the 1st, 2nd, and/or 3rd person
Only female characters can change but you can have male characters urge them to do so.
Characters of any age can change.
Also there can be other transformations if you don't like the whole slob angle.

What is NOT allowed
No single line entries or they will be removed.
No sexual stuff involving characters under 18 years of age (Although, you could technically get around this rule by aging the characters up to at least 18 years old).

Always make additions at least 4,000 characters. (This means that only characters not used in onomatopoeias will count toward the 4,000 character quota, so for anyone who relies heavily on using them, either use them less and be more creative in your stories or just stop writing on this interactive altogether.)
Please add a creative title to chapters. It makes the chapter sound more appealing to other readers.
Use good grammar, spelling, and punctuation.
Males could do any of the stuff above, but the main focus must be about females doing any of those things.
I can delete chapters that break one of these rules.
Also if one wishes to continue their stories, they should add "(reserved)" in the option(s) that they want to add in to prevent other people from furthering the tale in a way that they don't agree with.
If you have any questions, please ask.
Other than that anything goes, have fun.

--

For anyone who has a request that they'd like to give me, there are some rules in place for them.

1. I'll only be writing stories. My artistic skills are horrible.

2. Said stories will only be around 2,000-5,000 characters long. This goes for Deviantart, Aryion.com, Fanfiction.net, and Writing.com. I'll need at least three days to completely one story. Sorry, but my writing process is very slow. This character limit also applies to any story that I am requested to write on my interactives.

3. I'll typically just do stories centered around giantism, burping, and/or eating, so keep that in mind if you decide to send me requests.

4. I'll write fanfiction involving characters from already established fiction (i.e. Certain Western Animation, Films, Comics, Video Games, Anime/Manga, etc.) & about anyone's original character, just characters that exist in fictional works.

5. I'll only write about certain fictional works that I'm well versed in, so if I'm not familiar enough with the work that you want me to use, then I'll have to deny your request.

6. I reserve the right to deny any request I choose, so hope that I like your ideas enough to use them.

7. I'll only be taking one request at a time, so if I decide to take a request from one person, then everyone else waits until I complete the work that I'm already doing, regardless of what site I get it from. (i.e. This means that if I take a request from someone on Deviantart or Writing.com or Aryion.com or Fanfiction.net, then I will NOT accept another from anyone else on Deviantart or Writing.com or Aryion.com or Fanfiction.net or any other website until the current one is completed.)

8. Anyone who requests me to write something must write something for me in return. This goes for every site that I am a part of.

Will Do / Won't Do
I will do any stories involving giantesses, females burping/belching, eating, and/or performing oral vore. I will also do farting if I feel like it. I won't do anything involving giants, males burping/belching, eating, and/or performing oral vore. I also won't do any other kind of vore besides oral. I won't do anything involving sex or featuring characters below eighteen engaging in sexual activities. I also won't do expansion of any body part besides bellies. I won't do videos and/or pictures because my artistic skills are horrible.

Pricing
None. I don't know how to send or receive money.

These are the rules that I've set up and I expect everyone to follow them.

Enjoy and PLEASE Add!

--

[UPDATE!]

8:40PM Midwestern Time, Saturday, June 9th, 2018: I recently had a conversation with rainbowriderv (15) and I feel like the '4,000 character minimum' rule might be discouraging some people who might otherwise contribute. Henceforth, the new minimum requirement for a chapter is 2,000 characters.

--

[UPDATE!]

9:17PM Midwestern Time, Friday, February 28th, 2020: This interactive has just hit its 1,000th chapter! Thanks to everyone who has written here for contributing to this milestone.
